original: Military Missions
translation: 军事任务

original: Build to Force Limit
translation: 大规模征兵

original: Any growing country must maintain a reasonably sized army. By expanding our forces we can both further our political interests abroad and stimulate our domestic economy.
translation: 任何一个发展中国家都必须保持一支规模合理的军队。通过扩大我们的军事力量，我们既可以促进我们在国外的政治利益，也可以刺激我们的国内经济。

original: Expand [Root.GetName]
translation: 拓展[Root.GetName]

original: We have been given a strong and viable country by those that came before us. It is time we expand upon our legacy and grow [Root.GetName] so that we may leave a stronger and more influential country to our children.
translation: 先人摆在我们面前的是一个强大而富足的国家。现在是延续我们的先人的遗产和扩张[Root.GetName]的时候了，这样我们就可以把一个更强大、更有影响力的国家留给我们的子孙们了。

original: Conquer New States
translation: 开疆扩土

original: As we expand we must ensure that we can truly integrate the new lands we conquer into our administrative apparatus. After conquest comes the hard work of establishing true [Root.GetAdjective] Rule over the conquered territories.
translation: 随着我们领土的扩张，我们必须确保我们能够真正地将我们征服的新土地纳入我们的行政机构管理之下。建立 [Root.GetAdjective] 的统治才是征服领土后的最艰苦工作。

original: Assemble An Army
translation: 建立一支军队

original: Our territorial ambitions require a grand army. We must build and maintain a strong standing army that can defend and expand the lands under our rule.
translation: 对领土扩张的野心使得我们需要一支庞大的军队。我们必须建立与维护一支由我们掌控的而又强大的常备军用来保卫和扩张我们统治下的领土。

original: Unite Home Region
translation: 统一地区

original: The time has come to put all our hard work to build a viable military machine to the test. We must rise to be the true hegemon of our region, respected and feared by all.
translation: 现在是时候把我们的国家重心放在建立一个军队来接受战争的考验了。我们必须要崛起，成为我们地区所有国家和人民的尊重和畏惧的真正霸主。

original: Diplomatic Missions
translation: 外交任务

original: Trusthworthy Allies
translation: 可靠的盟友

original: No country can stand alone in this world. We must build lasting relationships with other countries if we are to be able to grow and prosper long term.
translation: 世界上没有哪个国家能够崛起而不依靠盟友。我们必须与其他国家建立持久的关系，这样我们才能得到长期的发展和繁荣。

original: Acquire Subjects
translation: 寻求附庸

original: What good is power if no one recognizes it? We must acquire subject states that pay us the kind of respect one would expect from a country like [Root.GetName].
translation: 如果没有人能认识到我们的力量，那拥有它又有何用呢？我们必须拥有附庸国，给予我们像[Root.GetName]这样的国家应有的尊敬。

original: Create a Grand Fleet
translation: 组建一支舰队

original: In order to be able to project power overseas a high seas navy is a must. Warships may be expensive but it is an investment that is well worth it if we can find new markets to dominate and peoples to conquer.
translation: 为了能够把力量投射到海外，公海海军是必须的。军舰可能很昂贵，但如果我们能够找到新的市场和人民来征服，这项投资便会十分值得。

original: Dominate Trade
translation: 主导本地贸易

original: Our merchant communities have been growing stronger and stronger for a long time now. It is time we give them the help they require to truly dominate our domestic trade. No foreign power must be allowed to influence the well being of our subjects.
translation: 长久以来，我们的商人团变得越来越强大。现在是我们给予他们帮助，让他们控制国内贸易的时候了。我们决不允许任何外国势力影响我们臣民的福祉。

original: For the rest of the campaign one owned province in your Home Trade Node will get:\nLocal Trade Power: §G+10.00§!\nLocal Development Cost: §G-5%§!
translation: 游戏结束之前，你的一个位于你本埠贸易节点的省份将获得：\n本地贸易竞争力：§G+10.00§!\n本地发展度花费：§G-5%§!

original: Expand Overseas
translation: 海外扩张

original: As big as the world is it is still interconnected through a number of vital trade routes. In an ancient order cloth, spices, metals, bullion, Chinaware and all kind of manufactured goods are brought across deserts and oceans to those who would pay the most for them. Taking a share of this trade, through acquiring useful ports in trade regions far abroad, could make even the smallest power richer than Croesus.
translation: 尽管世界很大，但它仍然通过许多重要的贸易路线相互联系。在古老的秩序中，布料、香料、金属、金条、瓷器和各种制成品被带到沙漠和海洋中，给那些愿意为它们付出最大代价的人。通过在国外贸易地区购买有用的港口来分享这一贸易，即使是最小的力量也可能比克罗萨斯更富有。

original: Administrative Missions
translation: 行政任务

original: High Income
translation: 提高收入

original: We must increase state income by any means necessary. Money is a requirement for any endeavour of the state, from the daily expenses of the government to the maintenance of armies to invade our enemies.
translation: 我们必须以一切必要的手段增加国家收入。从政府的日常开支到用来入侵敌人的军队维护，金钱是国家任何努力的必要条件。

original: Build Buildings
translation: 建设建筑

original: Let us never sit idle, even in peaceful times. Instead we must use our resources with industry, in order to make sure that we have funds available in time if misfortune should strike upon us.
translation: 即使在和平时期，我们也不要无所事事。相反，我们必须把我们的资源用在工业上，以确保在不幸的情况下，我们能及时获得资金。

original: Build a Treasury
translation: 建立金库

original: A large treasury is an imperative buffer for all things that could befall us through. If this is seen as miserly, it is because some do not realize that this vice is the very essence of what it means to reign.
translation: 富足的国库是所有可能降临到我们头上的事情的必要缓冲。如果这被视为吝啬，那是因为有些人没有意识到这一罪恶正是统治的本质所在。

original: Build Manufactories
translation: 建造工厂

original: Great advances are being made in the field of production, both technological and organisational. Let us invest greatly in new manufactories, a great industrious revolution might soon be upon us.
translation: 由于在生产领域，技术和组织方面都取得了很大的进步。所以让我们大力投资新的工厂，一场伟大的工业革命可能很快就要到来了。

original: Imperial Conquest
translation: 帝国征服

original: Securing wealth must always be the foremost priority of our state. Let us make use of the expensive armies and fleets that our economic prosperity has bought us to acquire even more resources and subjects for an aspiring empire.
translation: 确保财富始终是我们国家的首要任务。让我们利用经济繁荣为我们带来的昂贵的军队和舰队，获取更多的资源和臣民用来成就一个帝国。

original: Conquer Novgorod
translation: 征服诺夫哥罗德

original: Although the great Alexander Nevsky protected Rus from the Teutonic and Swedish pillagers, the Mantle of the Protection of Rus has passed to Muscovy. We must conquer Novgorod and make the Princes of Novgorod see the truth by force of arms.
translation: 伟大的亚历山大·涅夫斯基曾经从条顿骑士团和瑞典的劫掠者手中保卫了罗斯人，而现在保卫的重任交到了莫斯科手中。我们必须征服诺夫哥罗德并且用武力让诺夫哥罗德亲王明白这一真理。

original: Invade Novgorod
translation: 入侵诺夫哥罗德

original: The Boyars of Novgorod stubbornly resist our rule. We must prepare an invasion force to subjugate them.
translation: 诺夫哥罗德的贵族们顽固的拒绝臣服于我国。我们必须准备一支侵略军征服他们。

original: Consolidate Russia
translation: 统一俄罗斯

original: The Russian lands are divided into many independent Principalities. The Princes must all be united under our rule.
translation: 俄罗斯地区被许多独立公国所割据，他们必须被我们统一。

original: Tame the Steppes
translation: 驯服草原

original: The constant threat of raids from the nomads to our south must come to an end. From the area of Tambov we can prepare to strike out against the hordes.
translation: 我们必须解决游牧民族对我国南方地区的持续袭扰。我们可以从坦波夫地区开始对游牧进行反击。

original: Consolidate the Steppes
translation: 统一草原

original: Though we have defeated many of the most threatening hordes, we can further improve our strategic position in the Steppes. Let us consolidate in the region and subjugate any remaining nomads.
translation: 虽然我们打败了许多极具威胁性的部落，但我们在草原上的战略地位应该被进一步提高。让我们统一这个地区，征服剩下的游牧民族。

original: Liberate Ruthenia
translation: 解放鲁塞尼亚

original: The Polish Commonwealth is both weak and unfit to rule the proud Ruthenian and Byelorussian peoples and other countries have also come to this realization. It is high time we act before the region is partitioned among our rivals.
translation: 波兰联邦既软弱又不适合统治骄傲的鲁塞尼亚和白俄罗斯人民，其他国家也已认识到这一点。我们必须抢在我们的宿敌把该地区瓜分前采取行动。

original: Colonize Western Siberia
translation: 殖民西伯利亚

original: We have started to drive the Tatars out of Siberia, to strengthen our hold on these regions we must establish forts so they can be brought into Russian control.
translation: 我们已经开始把鞑靼人赶出西伯利亚，为了加强我们对这些地区的控制，我们必须建立堡垒，这样它们才能被俄罗斯控制。

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! owns at least §Y15§! fully colonized provinces in the West Siberia Region.
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!在西伯利亚地区拥有至少§Y15§!个殖民省份。

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! owns at least §Y10§! fully colonized provinces in the East Siberia Region.
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!在东西伯利亚地区拥有至少§Y10§!个殖民省份。

original: Alliance with Lithuania
translation: 与立陶宛结盟

original: Lithuania is our natural friend and ally. We should pursue close relations with that nation.
translation: 立陶宛是我们天然的朋友、盟友，我们应当与它保持密切的联系。

original: End the Kalmar Union
translation: 结束卡尔玛联合

original: Sweden has been subsumed under the crown of Denmark for too long. It should strive towards independence so that it may develop and expand on its own terms.
translation: 瑞典被纳入丹麦王冠已经太久了。它应努力实现独立，以便能够根据自己的条件发展和壮大。

original: The Baltic Fleet
translation: 波罗的海舰队

original: Sweden has ambitions to conquer the Baltic, but to do so it will need a mighty fleet.
translation: 瑞典有着征服波罗的海的雄心壮志，但首先它需要一支强大的舰队。

original: Swedish New World
translation: 瑞典新大陆

original: The New World is open for conquest. Sweden should take advantage of this opportunity while it lasts.
translation: 新大陆已经敞开征服的大门，在此期间，瑞典应该利用好这次机会。

original: Integrate Norway
translation: 合并挪威

original: Norway has long been subject to Denmark, but it is time to annex them directly.
translation: 长期以来挪威一直是丹麦的附庸，但现在是时候直接合并它了。

original: Unite Scandinavia
translation: 统一斯堪的纳维亚

original: With Norway finally integrated, only Sweden stands between us and the achievement of a single Scandinavian nation.
translation: 随着挪威最终被吞并，我们实现大一统斯堪的纳维亚的阻碍只剩下瑞典了。

original: The Baltic Fleet
translation: 波罗的海舰队

original: Denmark has ambitions to conquer the Baltic, but to do so it will need a mighty fleet.
translation: 丹麦有着征服波罗的海的雄心壮志，但首先它需要一支强大的舰队。

original: The province of Neumark was once an integral part of Brandenburg. It was leased to the Teutonic Knights, but they have neglected the land, causing its local burghers to demand a return to the old administration.
translation: 诺伊马尔克省曾经是勃兰登堡不可分割的一部分。但它被租让给条顿骑士团后，这片领地没有得到他们的妥善管理，导致当地居民要求回归旧政府。

original: Reclaim Neumark
translation: 收复诺伊马尔克

original: Pomeranian Succession
translation: 波美拉尼亚继承权

original: We have rights to succession to the Duchy of Pomerania. The only way to ensure that our claims are not forgotten is to seize the region by force.
translation: 我们有权继承波美拉尼亚公国。 确保我们的主张不被遗忘的唯一方法是强制占领该地区。

original: Conquer Silesia
translation: 征服西里西亚

original: Although some would say that our claim to Silesia is a bit shaky, we do have some grounds for claiming this province as our own. The prestige of our country depends on us pushing those claims.
translation: 虽然有些人会说我们对西里西亚的主张有点动摇，但我们确实有理由声称这个省是我们自己的。我们国家的威望取决于我们推动这些的主张。

original: The Duchy of Cleves
translation: 克里维斯公国

original: Through complex laws of succession, we have a claim to the Duchy of Cleves. While shaky, it provides a cause for expansion into the Rhineland.
translation: 通过复杂的继承法律，我们获得了克里夫公爵领地的宣称。在岌岌可危的时候，它提供了我们扩张到莱茵河地区的理由。

original: Integrate Urbino
translation: 合并乌尔比诺

original: The Dukes of Urbino enjoy the benefits of Papal protection. They would be protected better as an integral province of the Papal States.
translation: 乌尔比诺公国享受着教宗的保护。成为教宗国的一部分后它将得到更好的保护。

original: Genoese Trade Dominance
translation: 主导热亚那的贸易

original: Genoa lives and dies on trade. As things stand, we do not even have control over the western Mediterranean. It is imperative that we improve our trade power in our home waters.
translation: 热那亚的贸易现在生死攸关。就目前情况而言，我们甚至没有对西地中海的控制权。我们必须提高我们在本国水域的贸易实力。

original: Conquer Tunis
translation: 征服突尼斯

original: Tunis is haven for Barbary Pirates that constantly harrass our merchants. If we were to take the port of Tunis and the surrounding coast for ourselves, we would not only weaken the pirates but also establish Genoa as a trade power in North Africa.
translation: 突尼斯是巴巴里海盗的避风港，经常骚扰我们的商人。如果我们自己占领突尼斯港和周围的海岸，我们不仅会削弱海盗，而且会使热那亚成为北非的贸易强国。

original: Leave the Empire
translation: 脱离神圣罗马帝国

original: Genoa has traditionally aligned with the Guelph faction of Italian city-states which supports the primacy of the Pope over the Emperor. This has made the Emperor's protection a mixed blessing at best. As the Empire loses its grasp on Italy, Genoa must take this opportunity to strike out on its own.
translation: 热那亚传统上与意大利城邦的盖尔夫派结盟，支持教宗凌驾于皇帝之上。这使得皇帝的保护充其量是一种好坏参半的祝福。当帝国失去对意大利的控制时，热那亚必须利用这个机会独自出击。

original: Competitive Advantage
translation: 竞争优势

original: The Berber fleets have been permitted free reign over the mouth of the Meditteranean for too long. It is time we showed them the prowess of the Portuguese Navy.
translation: 柏柏尔舰队已经被允许在地中海的入洋口自由掌权太久了。 是时候向他们展示葡萄牙海军的实力了。

original: Expand the Buffer Zone
translation: 扩张缓冲地带

original: Our foothold in North Africa is proving useful in the defense of Christendom, but to ensure that it can be held, we must expand the area we hold.
translation: 我们在北非的立脚点在防御基督教世界中变得更加重要，但是为了确保能继续运营我们必须扩展这片区域

original: The Cape of Good Hope
translation: 好望角

original: Treacherous waters surround the legendary cape of Africa, but who knows what wonders lie beyond? Our expansion puts great strain on the merchant fleet, and we must be sure to provide them adequate protection.
translation: 传说中，非洲之角周围水域险恶，但是远方的未知持续吸引着我们。我们的扩张给商船舰队带来了巨大的压力，我们必须确保为它们提供充分的保护。

original: Beyond Cape Bojador
translation: 远方的博哈多尔角

original: Our explorers believe that Africa extends but a short way further south and soon we will be able to swing round and find the Kingdom of Prester John. Once we have secured an alliance with the Kingdom we will be able sweep the moors out of the holy land.
translation: 我们的探险家相信非洲延伸到更南的很短的一段路，很快就能被我们绕出去，找到约翰牧师的王国。一旦我们与王国建立了联盟，我们就能将荒原从圣地清除出去。

original: Colonise West Africa
translation: 殖民西非

original: It appears that Africa is stretching further south than we first believed. Prester John's legendary Kingdom is surely close at hand; Africa surely can't be much bigger than this.
translation: 非洲似乎正向南延伸，超出了我们最初的想象。约翰牧师的传奇王国确实近在咫尺；非洲肯定不会比这更大。

original: Settle in Central Africa
translation: 定居中非

original: Only a few explorers have ventured south from the Ivory Coast, and fewer still have returned. Even so, the riches we have gathered from our exploits in Africa have been astounding. If we send enough men, some are certain to survive.
translation: 只有少数探险家从象牙海岸冒险南下，而返回的人则更少。即使如此，我们从我们在非洲的功绩中获得的财富也令人震惊。如果我们派出足够多的人，一些人肯定会活下来。

original: Control the Shipping Lanes
translation: 控制海路

original: There are few left to challenge our mercantile authority in this region. Nevertheless, we must be seen to exert total control over our own affairs before we continue our journey of exploration Eastwards.
translation: 几乎没有人能挑战我们在这个地区的商业权威。然而，在我们继续向东探索之旅之前，我们必须看到对我们自己事务的全面控制。

original: Shipyards of the East
translation: 东方造船厂

original: No-one knew what we would find on this journey of exploration, but one thing is clear: it is not yet over. We must lay claim to sheltered natural harbors, where our fleets can resupply.
translation: 没有人知道我们在这次探索之旅中会发现什么，但有一点是清楚的：它还没有结束。我们必须要求有庇护的天然港口，在那里我们的舰队可以补给。

original: Brazilian Dominance
translation: 主导巴西

original: To appease the Captains who discovered and partitioned the land, we must push forward and expand our territory in South America.
translation: 为了安抚那些发现和瓜分新大陆的船长们，我们必须推动和扩张我们在南美的领土。

original: Conquer Zanzibar
translation: 征服桑给巴尔

original: The Northern Swahili coast is covered in wealthy trading cities where Indian and Persian merchants come to buy gold and Ivory in exchange for their own cloth and manufactured products. These trader cities are, however, quite precariously situated for someone controling the open seas. Let us conquer these lands and put them firmly under Portuguese control.
translation: 北斯瓦希里海岸覆盖着富裕的贸易城市，印度和波斯商人来购买黄金和象牙，以换取他们自己的布和制成品。然而，对于那些控制开放海域的人来说，这些交易商城市岌岌可危。让我们征服这些土地，把它们牢牢地控制在葡萄牙人的控制之下。

original: Horn of Africa
translation: 非洲之角

original: Our explorers have at last reached the other side of the Gulf of Aden, where so much spice and other valuables are imported to the Mediterranean. This area must be charted and exploited if we are to bring this wealth to Portugal.
translation: 我们的探险者终于到达了亚丁湾的另一边，那里有这么多香料和其他贵重物品被进口到地中海。如果我们要把这一财富带给葡萄牙，就必须对这一地区进行规划和开发。

original: Conquer Hormuz
translation: 征服霍尔木兹海峡

original: The straits of Hormuz are imperative to control the flow of trade between India, Iran and Arabian Iraq. By seizing control over the island of Hormuz we can dominate local trade and lay claim to the maritime empire it once created.
translation: 霍尔木兹海峡对于控制印度、伊朗和阿拉伯伊拉克之间的贸易流动是必不可少的。通过夺取霍尔木兹岛的控制权，我们可以主导当地的贸易，并对它曾经创建的海洋帝国拥有主权。

original: Enables new Events
translation: 启用新事件

original: Secure Trade
translation: 保护贸易

original: We must move to establish our primacy in the markets of the East. With control over the flow of exotic wares, those who do business with us in the West will be at our mercy.
translation: 我们必须采取行动，确立我们在东方市场的主导地位。有了对外来商品流动的控制，那些在西方与我们做生意的人将任由我们摆布。

original: Settle Indonesia
translation: 定居印度尼西亚

original: We have heard tales that the Spice islands lie somewhere to the east. Already daring men are ready to voyage there, all they need is some support from the crown.
translation: 我们听说过香料岛位于东边某个地方的传说。勇敢的人已经做好了航行的准备，他们所需要的只是来自皇室的一些支持。

original: Maritime Empire
translation: 海上帝国

original: Our burgeoning global presence demands a maritime tradition fit for a nation of our stature. The tall ships of [Root.GetName] must inspire awe among our friends, and terror among our enemies. Lay the keel!
translation: 我们迅速的国际竞争需要一个适合我们这种体量国家的海洋传统。[Root.GetName]的巨轮必须在我们的朋友中激起敬畏，在我们的敌人中激起恐惧。把龙骨放下！

original: Discover the Americas
translation: 发现美洲

original: Hushed whispers tell of mysterious lands to the far West, ripe for growth, and filled with unimaginable wonders. If this is true, they must be ours.
translation: 悄悄的低语诉说着遥远的西部神秘土地，成熟的生长，充满了难以想象的奇迹。如果这是真的，他们一定是我们的。

original: Settle in America
translation: 定居北美

original: The lands of America seem suitable for many things. In the north we have heard talk of furs and shipbuilding materials. In the South the land looks suitable for growing of many crops. We must establish bases there so we can profit.
translation: 美国的土地似乎适合做许多事情。在北方，我们听到人们谈论皮毛和造船材料。在南方，这片土地看起来适合种植许多作物。我们必须在那里建立基地，这样我们才能获利。

original: Colonize the Caribbean
translation: 殖民加勒比

original: The islands of the Caribbean offer lucrative opportunities for certain types of gentleman with the will to acquire them, and the labor to exploit them. We have exactly those types of gentlemen.
translation: 加勒比海的岛屿为某些类型的绅士提供了丰厚的机会，他们有着获取它们的意愿，以及利用它们的劳动。我们正好有那种类型的绅士。

original: Discover India
translation: 发现印度

original: Discover India
translation: 发现印度

original: Trade with India has been continuing for time immemorial, but with the long routes, others are profiting from this. We must outfit an expedition and find a sea route to India.
translation: 与印度的贸易已经要追溯到远古，但是因为贸易路线过长，我们很难和其他人竞争.我们必须组织一次远征来找到前往印度的海上路线

original: Chart the Southern Seas
translation: 绘制南大洋

original: Daring men, with true British grit, are seeking government support to chart the vast empty expanses of the southern oceans. Rumours tell of land there for the taking; we should make haste to establish a thriving colony, before others seize the opportunity.
translation: 勇敢的人，带着真正的英国式勇气，正在寻求政府的支持，来绘制南大洋广阔的空旷地带。谣传那里有土地可供征用，在别人抓住机会之前，我们应该赶快建立一个繁荣昌盛的殖民地。

original: Establish Trade in India
translation: 在印度建立贸易

original: The Honorable East India Company is asking for our permission to establish trade in India. A powerful parliamentary lobby backs them and there are sure to be benefits to the crown.
translation: 尊敬的东印度公司请求我们允许在印度建立贸易。一个强大的议会在背后支持的它们，而且它们肯定有利于皇室。

original: Now that we have clearly established our colonial dominance, it is time we reaped the rewards at home. Whatever flows through the Channel is rightfully ours, and we shall have our due.
translation: 既然我们已经明确确立了我们的殖民统治地位，现在是我们在国内获得回报的时候了。任何流经英吉利海峡的东西都是我们应得的，我们将得到应有的回报。

original: Monopolize the Channel
translation: 垄断海峡

original: Now that we have clearly established our colonial dominance, valuable wares have begun to arrive from the colonies. Whatever flows through the Channel is rightfully ours, and we must protect our investments abroad and at home.
translation: 既然我们已经明确确立了我们的殖民统治地位，宝贵的货物就开始从殖民地运抵。任何流经英吉利海峡的东西都是我们的，我们必须保护我们在国外和国内的投资。

original: Take Gibraltar
translation: 夺取直布罗陀

original: The port of Gibraltar may be a useful bargaining tool in dealing with the Spaniards and Moors. It would also be an invaluable resupply base for our Mediterranean operations.
translation: 直布罗陀港可能是对付西班牙人和摩尔人的一个有用的谈判工具。这也将是我们地中海行动的宝贵再补给基地。

original: Increase our Reach
translation: 扩大我国疆域

original: The Baleares are economically worthless, but the importance of their proximity to the French coast cannot be understated. We must own them. Owning Sardinia would give us valuable proximity to Italy.
translation: 巴利阿里群岛在经济上一文不值，但他们靠近法国海岸的重要性怎么强调也不为过。我们必须拥有他们。拥有撒丁岛将将缩短我们与意大利宝贵的距离。

original: Mediterranean Authority
translation: 地中海霸权

original: While initially we viewed our Mediterranean assets as a strategic tool in the wars against our neighbors, it has become apparent that we can exert power over the flow of trade in the region. We should aim to increase this.
translation: 虽然我们最初认为我们的地中海资产是对我们邻国的战争中的一个战略工具，但我们显然可以对该区域的贸易流动施加力量。我们的目标应该是增加这一点。

original: North Sea Islands
translation: 北海群岛

original: Although out of our minds for a long time now, our gaze falls upon the occupied islands to the North. They are worth little, but perhaps they could be useful stepping stones to further reaches.
translation: 我们的目光落在了北方被占领的岛屿上，虽然它们在我们的脑海中已经有很长一段时间了。它们的价值微乎其微，但或许它们可以成为进一步深入的垫脚石。

original: The Thirteen Colonies
translation: 十三殖民地

original: As our colonies grow in stature and influence, so too does the number of volunteers willing to make the treacherous journey to the West. Let us make this part of the world our own.
translation: 随着我们的殖民地的地位和影响力的增长，自愿前往西方的志愿者人数也在增加。让我们把世界的这一部分变成我们自己的地方。

original: War of the Roses
translation: 玫瑰战争

original: This is a conflict that many have long seen coming. Our people must be safely shepherded through this period of uncertainty one way or another.
translation: 这是一场许多人早就预料到的冲突。我们的人民必须以某种方式安全地度过这一不确定时期。

original: Complete the War of the Roses disaster, or reach the Age of Reformation without triggering it.
translation: 完成玫瑰战争，或者是到改革时代也没有触发它

original: Control State Religion
translation: 控制国教

original: Religious anarchy has gripped Europe. We must take control of the situation, and decide where we stand on the matter of the Divine.
translation: 宗教无政府状态笼罩着欧洲。我们必须控制局势，并决定我们在神性问题上的立场。

original: The [Root.GetAdjective] Empire
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]帝国

original: The [Root.GetAdjective] Empire stretches from East to West; few nations can match our tenacity. Nevertheless, there is still land out there that does not yet belong to us...
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]帝国从东方延伸到西方，几乎没有哪个国家能比得上我们的坚韧不拔。尽管如此，仍有不属于我们的土地...

original: Settle the North
translation: 定居格陵兰岛

original: Inhospitable. Freezing. Deadly. The words used to describe the far North are many and varied, but we; we will master this land.
translation: 荒芜之地、冰冻之地、死亡之地，这是各种各样描述遥远北方的词语。而对于我们：我们将会是这片土地的主人！

original: [1104.GetName] will receive a proper [Root.GetAdjective] name.
translation: [1104.GetName] 将获得一个正式的 [Root.GetAdjective] 名称。

original: Colonize Canada
translation: 殖民加拿大

original: Colder and harsher than the southerly lands, the territory of Canada is, nevertheless, ripe for exploitation. Exotic furs, wood and minerals are abundant in the snowy mountains.
translation: 加拿大的土地比南方的领土更加的严寒恶劣，尽管如此，开发的时机已经成熟。雪山中有着异国毛皮、木材，矿物也十分丰富。

original: The Hundred Years' War
translation: 百年战争

original: The Treaty of Tours has brought an uneasy period of truce between [Root.GetName] and France. Both sides are aware that this is unlikely to last, and we must decide whether to honour their treaty and bide our time, or prepare for war.
translation: “图尔条约”给[Root.GetName]和法国带来了一段不稳定的休战时期。双方都意识到，这不太可能持续太久，我们必须决定是履行条约，等待时机，还是为战争做准备。

original: Strategic Control
translation: 战略控制

original: As the Hundred Years' War resumes, it is time we adjusted our approach. Rather than whittle away the French forces with skirmishes and pitched battles, we should strike at the heart of their nation.
translation: 随着百年战争的继续，是时候调整我们的战略了。我们不应该用小规模的冲突和激烈的战斗来削减法国军队，我们应该对他们国家的核心进行打击。

original: Conquer Brittany
translation: 征服布列塔尼

original: Since the reign of William the Conqueror, Brittany has been associated with [Root.GetName]. It is time it was restored to the Crown.
translation: 自从征服者威廉统治以来，布列塔尼一直与[Root.GetName]联系在一起。是时候让它归还给国王了。

original: Angevin Kingdom
translation: 安茹王国

original: The Angevin Kings ruled over a full half of the French lands, ensuring prosperity and justice were freely available. Reuniting these lands under one Crown will ensure our continued success.
translation: 安格温国王统治着法国一半的土地，确保了这里的繁荣和正义。将这些土地统一在我们的国王之下将确保我们继续迈向成功。

original: Control Electors
translation: 操纵选帝侯

original: With France out of the way, and much of Europe in awe at our might, it is time we turn our attention to the self-proclaimed 'Holy Roman Empire'.
translation: 随着法国的退出，以及欧洲大部分地区对我们的实力的敬畏，现在是时候把我们的注意力转向自封的“神圣罗马帝国”了。

original: Great Britain, Ascendant
translation: 大不列颠至尊

original: Our fortunes are on the rise. Kings bow before our majesty, nations cave before our forces. There is only one throne greater than ours left to topple.
translation: 我们的财富在增加。国王在我们的陛下面前鞠躬，一些国家在我们的军队面前屈服。只剩一个比我们还强大的王室等我们去推翻。

original: Renovate Oxbridge
translation: 修缮大学

original: The facilities at the centuries old universities of Oxford and Cambridge are beginning to prove unfit for purpose. A small investment should improve matters considerably.
translation: 像牛津和剑桥等历史悠久的大学的设施有些已经不适合使用。 少量投资应该可以大大改善这种情况。

original: Seize Burgundy
translation: 占领勃艮第

original: The last vestiges of the Duchy of Burgundy have fallen on hard times. When they turned their backs on us following the Treaty of Arras, we did not forget. Their land will be forfeit.
translation: 勃艮第公爵和他剩下的残兵已经陷入绝境，我们绝对不会忘记他们在「阿拉斯条约」后背弃了我们。现在该用他们的土地来偿还这笔债了。

original: Seize Alexandria
translation: 夺取亚历山大

original: The fertile delta at the mouth of the Nile is an important trading hub in the Mediterranean. Possession of this area would give us great influence over the influx of goods from the East.
translation: 尼罗河河口肥沃的三角洲是地中海重要的贸易中心。占有这一地区将使我们对来自东方的货物流入产生很大的影响。

original: Egyptian Authority
translation: 埃及霸主

original: Control over the city of Cairo is an opportunity too valuable to miss. Additionally, if we were to occupy a portion of the Sinai peninsula, all land movement from North Africa to the Middle East would have to go through us.
translation: 控制开罗城市是一个非常宝贵的机会，不容错过。此外，如果我们占领了西奈半岛的一部分，那么从北非到中东的所有陆路都必须经过我们。

original: Return Maine to §YFrance§! in the §YSurrender of Maine§! event
translation: 在§Y割让曼恩§!事件中归还曼恩给§Y法兰西§!

original: Control the Hansa
translation: 控制汉萨同盟

original: Many of our [Root.GetAdjective] ports are at the end of the lucrative Hanseatic trade route. Controlling more of the ports on this route would be a sensible business decision.
translation: 我们许多的[Root.GetAdjective]港口都在利润丰厚的汉萨贸易路线的尽头。在这条路线上控制更多的港口将是一个明智的商业决定。

original: Hanseatic East
translation: 汉萨东部

original: Beyond the Oresund, lie the rich Hanseatic cities of Danzig and Riga. Both have prospered greatly thanks to our custom. One might say they owe their riches to us. That debt is due.
translation: 在厄勒海峡边，汉萨有2座富饶的城市丹泽和里加，它们的取得巨大的繁荣都要感谢我们的援建。有人说它们的财富属于我们。现在该是回报的时候了。

original: Grow the Channel
translation: 发展海峡

original: The value of goods passing through the English Channel is vast. Let us make it known throughout the world that all wealth stops with us.
translation: 通过英吉利海峡的货物价值巨大。让我们向全世界宣告，一切财富都与我们同在。

original: Industrial Revolution
translation: 工业革命

original: [Root.Capital.GetName] is thick with smog billowing from countless chimneys, yet still the demand for coal grows. Government investors speak of profitable mineral veins in Derby and Glamorgan.
translation: [Root.Capital.GetName]烟雾缭绕，浓烟从无数烟囱中滚滚冒出，对煤炭的需求仍在增长。政府投资商在德比和格拉摩根取得了利润丰厚的矿脉。

original: Colonize Spice Islands
translation: 殖民香料群岛

original: The farthest reaches of the world produce wondrous spices, woven garments and exotic women. We should establish a presence here, for the benefit of [Root.GetAdjective] society.
translation: 在世界最遥远处有一个生产奇妙香料，有着心灵手巧和异国情调的女人的地方。为了[Root.GetAdjective]社会的利益，我们应该在这里建立一个殖民地。

original: Build Manufactories
translation: 建造工厂

original: As our vast industrial holdings grow, demand for fuel grows ever higher as mechanized industry takes shape around [Root.GetName]. Increase the supply of refined materials.
translation: 随着我们庞大的工业规模的增长，随着机械化工业的形成，[Root.GetName]对燃料的需求也越来越高。必须增加精炼材料的供应。

original: Levy the Troops
translation: 征集部队

original: Our sights are set on finally dealing with our troublesome Gaelic neighbors. They may suffer from a lack of recognisable nobility and bureaucracy, but they do put up quite a fight. Raise an army, and seize their land!
translation: 我们最终的目标是与麻烦的盖尔族邻居打交道。他们确实跟贵族和官僚进行了相当大的斗争。组建一支军队，夺取他们的土地！

original: Conquer Ireland
translation: 征服爱尔兰

original: Historically known as 'His Majesty's Irish Enemies', the Gaelic populace of Ireland have long been outside English rule. It is time they were brought to heel.
translation: 在历史上被称为“国王陛下的爱尔兰敌人”，爱尔兰的盖尔人长期处于英国统治之外。是时候让他们屈服了。

original: Subjugate France
translation: 征服法兰西

original: Lay claim to the Duchy of France. Their nobles shall bow their heads, or they shall lose them.
translation: 对法国提出附庸要求，法国的贵族们必须低头答应，否则他们将会失去整片土地。

original: Conquer Bengal
translation: 征服孟加拉

original: The [Root.GetAdjective] East Indian Trading Company has been operating in this region for some time. By their request, and with their guidance, it is time to solidify our hold on the fertile Bengal Delta.
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]的东印度贸易公司已经在这个地区经营了一段时间。根据他们的要求，在他们的指导下，现在是巩固我们对富饶的孟加拉三角洲的控制的时候了。

original: Inland India
translation: 印度内陆

original: The inland territories of India are renowned for their lucrative mines and rare jewels. Needless to say, the native inhabitants of the region would be much better off under our administration.
translation: 印度内陆地区以利润丰厚的矿场和珍稀珠宝而闻名于世。不用说，在我们的管理下，该地区的土著居民会过得更好。

original: Take Indian Coast
translation: 取得印度沿海地区

original: Undeniably, control over the seafront along the West Indian Coast would give us greater control over India as a whole. Take this land in the name of [Root.GetName].
translation: 不可否认，对印度西岸的控制将使我们对整个印度拥有更大的控制权。以[Root.GetName]之名，拿下这块土地。

original: Take North India
translation: 取得北印度

original: Our landowners report that our occupation is working well in the South, yet the East India Company tell us that it would be beneficial to all if we were to maintain direct control over Northern India.
translation: 我们的土地所有人报告说，我们的占领的南方运作良好，但东印度公司告诉我们，如果我们能够保持对北印度的直接控制，对所有人都有好处。

original: College of Justice
translation: 苏格兰高等法院

original: Scotland lacks a comprehensive, universal justice system. We should ensure that all Scots are ruled by the same laws through a single centralized institution.
translation: 苏格兰缺乏一个全面、普遍的司法体系。我们已经建立一个独立中央机构使用相同一套法律体系来约束所有的苏格兰人民。

original: The Education Acts
translation: 教育运动

original: Literacy is vital for the health of a nation that aspires to modernity. Church-led schools in every parish must be established, and all landowners must knows the basics of Latin, law, and the arts.
translation: 扫盲对于一个渴望现代化的国家的健康至关重要。必须在每个教区建立由教会领导的学校，所有地主都必须了解拉丁文、法律和艺术的基本知识。

original: Weather the Reformation
translation: 苏格兰之路

original: Cries for religious reform shake Europe to its core. Scotland must weather the storm in its own way, either through tolerance or through strict enforcement of the true faith.
translation: 宗教改革的呼声动摇了欧洲的核心。苏格兰必须以自己的方式度过这场风暴，要么通过宽容，要么通过严格执行真正的信仰。

original: The Bank of Scotland
translation: 苏格兰银行

original: National banks typically exist to finance the state, but Scotland shall take a different approach. The Bank of Scotland will lend mostly to business owners to encourage private development.
translation: 国家银行通常为国家融资，但苏格兰将采取不同的方式。苏格兰银行将主要向企业主提供贷款，以推动私人开发。

original: Central Belt Coal Mining
translation: 苏格兰中部地带煤矿挖掘

original: We have struck coal in Ayrshire! While its value may seem questionable now, this mundane-looking substance will surely fuel a new era in technology. We must prepare for this industrial revolution.
translation: 我们在艾尔夏发现了煤！ 虽然它的价值现在看来是值得怀疑的，但这种平凡的物质肯定会给技术带来一个新的时代。 我们必须为这一工业革命作准备。

original: The Auld Alliance
translation: 古老同盟

original: Scotland and France maintain close ties, promising mutual aid against English aggression. As the conflict between nations only seems to be escalating, Scotland must renew its diplomatic ties.
translation: 苏格兰和法国保持着密切的关系，承诺对英国的入侵进行互助。由于国与国之间的冲突似乎正在升级，苏格兰必须恢复外交关系。

original: Advance the Frontier
translation: 推进前线

original: Border skirmishes along the Scottish Marches are frequent and bloody. It is time to put an end to these petty squabbles by seizing the entire region for ourselves.
translation: 在苏格兰边区长期存在血腥而频繁的摩擦与冲突，是时候将这整片地域纳入境内，结束这些小打小闹了！

original: Into England
translation: 进军英格兰

original: We have suffered at the hands of English armies for too long. Scotland must cement its hold in northern Britain by annexing Northumbria into its domain.
translation: 我们遭受英格兰武力摆布的时间已经太久了，苏格兰必须通过吞并诺森布里亚来巩固我们对北不列颠的掌控。

original: Conquer London
translation: 征服伦敦

original: The North is ours, and the English capital lies open to us. There is no better time than now to end English hegemony.
translation: 北方是我们的，如今英格兰首都也向我们敞开了大门，没有比现在更好的时机来终结英格兰的霸权。

original: Orkney, Shetland, and Mann are the last of the nearby isles that elude our rule. Though currently held by the kings of England and Norway, we must watch for a chance to incorporate them into Scotland.
translation: 奥克尼、设得兰和马恩岛是附近最后几个逃避我们统治的岛屿。虽然目前由英格兰和挪威国王控制，但我们必须注意是否有机会将他们并入苏格兰。

original: Claiming the Isles
translation: 宣称群岛

original: Orkney, Shetland, and Mann are the last of the nearby isles that elude our rule. Though currently held by the kings of England and Norway, we must watch for a chance to incorporate them into Scotland.
translation: 奥克尼、设得兰和马恩岛是附近最后几个逃避我们统治的岛屿。虽然目前由英格兰和挪威国王控制，但我们必须注意是否有机会将他们并入苏格兰。

original: Into Ireland
translation: 进军爱尔兰

original: Ulster has always been a tempting target, but until recently too closely watched by the English king. With England distracted, perhaps now would be a good opportunity to venture an army into Ireland.
translation: 乌尔斯特一直是一个诱人的目标，但直到最近一直受到英国国王的密切关注。随着英国的注意力分散，现在也许是一个军队冒险进入爱尔兰的好机会。

original: Conquer Ireland
translation: 征服爱尔兰

original: Now that we have a foothold in Ireland, it seems only natural to continue expanding into the region. After all, the Irish clans are weak and divided while Scotland is united and strong.
translation: 既然我们在爱尔兰有了立足点，继续向该地区扩张似乎是理所当然的。毕竟，爱尔兰是软弱和分裂的，而苏格兰是团结和强大的。

original: Rule Britannia
translation: 统治大不列颠

original: All the British Isles shall be our domain. We will rule Britannia.
translation: 整个不列颠群岛都是我们的囊中之物。我们会统治不列颠尼亚。

original: North Sea Trade
translation: 北海贸易

original: Scotland is ideally located to dominate trade in the North Sea. We should cement our position through the construction of markets and trade ships.
translation: 苏格兰在理想情况下应当主导北海贸易，我们需要通过市场建设和贸易商船来巩固我们的地位。

original: The Darien Scheme
translation: 达里恩计划

original: Our financial advisors have assured us that there is absolutely no way that this could go wrong.
translation: 我们的财务顾问向我们保证这绝不会出错。

original: Own or have a subject own §Y2§! provinces in the §YPanama§! area
translation: 自己或附庸在§Y巴拿马§!地区拥有§Y2§!个省份。

original: Nova Scotia
translation: 新斯科舍

original: The pristine lands of the New World could offer much to Scotland. A suitable region has been identified in the northern regions, dubbed Nova Scotia by our explorers.
translation: 新大陆的无主之地可以为苏格兰提供更多的资源。在大陆北部已经发现一个合适的区域，我们的探险者将其命名为新斯科舍。

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! or their subjects own at least §Y5§! fully colonized provinces in the Colonial Canada colonial region
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!或他们的附庸在加拿大殖民地拥有至少§Y5§!个完成殖民的省份。

original: Revoke The Isles
translation: 收回群岛

original: Clan MacDonald, Lords of the Isles, have much influence among the Highland clans. Having already risen up in revolt several times in recent history, it is only a matter of time until they once again rally the Highlanders to resist Scottish rule. What's more, there are whispers of conspiracy with the English to divide our realm between the MacDonalds and the English King. Clearly the MacDonalds are too dangerous to remain as rulers of the isles.
translation: 麦克唐纳家族是群岛的领主，在高地部族中有很大的影响力。在目前的历史上，他们已经在几次起义中奋起，他们再次团结高地人反抗苏格兰统治只是时间问题。而且有传言说，英国人密谋将我们的王国划分为麦克唐纳领地和英王国。很明显，麦克唐纳太危险了，不能继续作为群岛的统治者。

original: Cod Wars
translation: 鳕鱼战争

original: The waters surrounding the Faroes and Iceland are rich with cod. Having already seized the Orkneys and Shetlands, a monopoly on North Atlantic fishing is within our grasp.
translation: 法罗群岛和冰岛周围的水域里有丰富的鳕鱼。在占领了奥克尼群岛和谢特兰之后，我们就可以垄断北大西洋捕鱼了。

original: Discover Caribbean
translation: 发现加勒比

original: It has long been theorized that rather than travel East, we could go West to India. We must put this theory to the test, and search out the ideal landing spot.
translation: 长期以来，人们一直认为，与其向东旅行，我们还可以到西方去印度。我们必须对这一理论进行检验，并寻找理想的着陆点。

original: Caribbean Colony
translation: 加勒比殖民地

original: The natives on our newfound territory of Hispaniola are friendly, pleasant, and most importantly, gullible. We should claim this region as our own by planting more [Root.GetAdjective] boots on the ground.
translation: 我们新发现的伊斯帕尼奥拉地区的土著人相当友善，最重要的是容易上当。我们应该通过建立更多的[Root.GetAdjective]军队来宣称这个地区是我们自己的。

original: The Spanish Main
translation: 新西班牙大陆

original: The Main, as it has become known, can be sighted from the decks of our trade ships before they dock at Hispaniola. If the prosperity of the Caribbean is any indication, it would be worth exploring the Main thoroughly.
translation: 据了解，在停靠在伊斯帕尼奥拉岛之前，可以从我们的商船的甲板上看到，如果加勒比有任何繁荣的迹象，那么就应该彻底地探索。

original: Establish La Plata
translation: 建立拉普拉塔

original: The verdant landscape of South America should make an excellent site for a new colonial venture.
translation: 南美洲的绿野美景将会成为新的殖民探险中一处绝佳的地点。

original: Aztec Conquest
translation: 征服阿兹特克

original: The system of entrada mandates that the self-proclaimed Aztec Empire belongs to us. Seize their land, and bring their gold back to [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 我们已经被授予特权进入自称阿兹特克帝国的国家，掠夺他们的土地，将他们的黄金带回[Root.Capital.GetName]。

original: Incan Hoards
translation: 印加的财富

original: The Inca fill their temples with gold, yet seem unaware of simply how much power this wealth commands. Their territory, as well as the gold, would be much safer in our hands.
translation: 印加人用金子填满了他们的庙宇，却似乎不知道这些财富的力量有多大。他们的领土，以及黄金，将更安全地掌握在我们手中。

original: Conquer the Inca
translation: 征服印加

original: The treasure that awaits in the mountains of Peru makes all the bloodshed seem worthwhile. We should press on and claim further glory for [Root.GetName].
translation: 在秘鲁山区的宝藏使所有的流血事件看起来都是值得的。我们应该继续为[Root.GetName]争取更多的荣誉。

original: Conquer Tarasca
translation: 征服塔拉斯卡

original: The indigenous Tarascan people made the egregious error of greeting us with gifts of gold and precious jewellery. They must have more. Find it.
translation: 土生土长的塔拉斯卡人犯了一个巨大的错误，用黄金和珍贵的珠宝来问候我们。他们肯定还有更多。找到它。

original: Prepare Reconquista
translation: 准备收复失地

original: For too long have we failed in our duty of care to the peoples of Iberia. We should prepare to unite them under one banner.
translation: 长久以来，我们没有履行庇护伊比利亚人民的职责。是时候做把他们团结在同一旗帜之下的准备了。

original: Reclaim Andalucia
translation: 收复安达卢西亚

original: The Moors have enjoyed our patience for hundreds of years. Remove them and reclaim Andalucia for the [Root.GetAdjective] Crown.
translation: 摩尔人已经享受了我们的容忍长达数百年。驱逐他们，以[Root.GetAdjective]之名收复安达卢西亚。

original: Recover Portugal
translation: 光复葡萄牙

original: The Kingdom of the Spains belongs to us. This includes our erstwhile neighbor, Portugal. Strip them of title, and return sovereignty to [Root.GetName].
translation: 西班牙王国属于我们。这包括了我们曾经的邻居，葡萄牙。剥夺他们的头衔，将主权归还给[Root.GetName]。

original: Claims in Aragon
translation: 宣称阿拉贡

original: A great deal of Aragonese territory was once ruled by [Root.GetName]. By force or by cunning, we must make it ours once again.
translation: 大量的阿拉贡的领土都曾经被[Root.GetName]统治。无论是使用武力抑或诡计，我们必须使它们再度回归。

original: Continue Reconquista
translation: 继续收复失地

original: Further to our claims in Iberia, we should establish our presence in a few cities in North Africa to protect against invasion.
translation: 在索取了伊比利亚后，我们应该在北非的一些城市确立我们的存在以防止入侵。

original: Convert Iberia
translation: 改变伊比利亚的信仰

original: The rest of Europe looks on disapprovingly as we appear to harbor heresy in our midst. Restore our misguided brothers to the one true faith.
translation: 由于我们内部似乎藏匿着异端邪说，我们被其他欧洲国家另眼相看。让我们误入歧途的兄弟恢复唯一的真正信仰。

original: Naval Dominance
translation: 海军统治力

original: We have long had ambitions in the Mediterranean. The ripe land of Italy is ours for the taking, however we need a nearby harbor, and a fleet grand enough to discourage the opportunistic Sultans in the East.
translation: 我们长期以来对地中海都有野心。意大利富饶的土地是我们可以占领的，然而我们需要一个附近的港口和一支足以阻止东部的奥斯曼的舰队。

original: Italian Ambition
translation: 意大利的野心

original: Italy is rich and ripe for the taking. Like so many before us, we will stake out our part of Italy, and reap its riches for ourselves.
translation: 掌握意大利就是掌握富饶与成熟。就像我们之前的许多人一样，我们将关注属于我们的那部分意大利，并为自己收获它的财富。

original: Explore Caribbean
translation: 探索加勒比海

original: The West India Company, finally formed after protracted discussions on funding, intends to focus on the establishment of trade routes between the West Indies and our heartland. We should chart the region, and earmark suitable land.
translation: 西印度公司是在长期讨论资金问题后最终成立的，它打算把重点放在建立西印度群岛与我们的心脏地带之间的贸易路线上。我们应该绘制区域图，指定合适的土地。

original: Settle North America
translation: 定居北美洲

original: The colonial era has truly begun. We should take advantage of our proximity to the American coast by establishing colonies further North.
translation: 殖民时代已真正开始。我们应利用我们与北美洲海岸的距离优势在更北的地方建立殖民地

original: Colonise the Cape
translation: 殖民开普

original: The East India Company require a settlement at the Cape of Africa, to act as a safe harbor and point of resupply for the journeys to the East. They are offering quite a sum if we oblige.
translation: 东印度公司要求在非洲角建立一个定居点，作为前往东部的一个安全港和补给点。如果我们愿意的话，他们的出价是相当高的。

original: Colonise Brazil
translation: 殖民巴西

original: The fertile land in Brazil would be an excellent place to begin a new colonial venture. We must not tolerate Iberian interference in this region of 'New Holland', however.
translation: 巴西肥沃的土地将是一个开始新的殖民冒险的好地方。然而，我们绝不能容忍伊比利亚人对这个“新荷兰”地区的干涉。

original: Seize Ceylon
translation: 占据锡兰

original: The island of Ceylon is well situated to be a resupply port, and would give us a competitive advantage over the other colonial powers in this region.
translation: 锡兰岛的位置很好，是一个补给港口，它将给我们这个地区其他殖民大国的竞争优势。

original: Discover Australia
translation: 发现澳大利亚

original: Rumours from the East tell of a large landmass to the South-East. It is time we charted the extent of Indonesia and Australasia.
translation: 从东方传来的谣言说东南有大片的陆地。现在是我们绘制印度尼西亚和澳大拉西亚范围的时候了。

original: Conquer Malacca
translation: 征服马六甲

original: Malacca is of great economic importance. We should take control of it immediately, to allow for superior influence over our trade interests in Indonesia.
translation: 马六甲具有重要的经济意义。我们应该立即控制它，以便对我们在印度尼西亚的贸易利益产生更大的影响。

original: Indonesian Trade
translation: 印度尼西亚贸易

original: Dutch dominance in the markets of Malacca is of paramount importance. Do whatever it takes to achieve a monopoly.
translation: 让马六甲的市场被荷兰人所支配有着无与伦比的重要性。不惜一切代价垄断它。

original: Dutch Formosa
translation: 荷兰的台湾

original: To aid in our efforts to open up trade with the Chinese, we should take establish a Dutch presence on the island of Taiwan.
translation: 为了帮助我们打开同中国的贸易，我们应当在台湾岛上设立荷兰人的居住地。

original: Reclaim Lowlands
translation: 收复低地

original: Our brethren are suffering at the hands of foreign oppressors. We are honour-bound to liberate them.
translation: 我们的同胞正遭受外国压迫者的剥削。我们在道义上必须解放他们。

original: Lowlands Reconquest
translation: 收复低地

original: Yet more of our people are controlled by foreign masters. It is our duty to seek their freedom.
translation: 我们的人民已经被外国领主统治了太久，为他们寻求自由是我们的职责。

original: Religious Unity
translation: 宗教统一

original: We must take a stand against heresy. Let us declare our allegiance to the one true faith!
translation: 我们必须采取反对异端邪说的立场。让我们宣布我们对一个真正的信仰的忠诚！

original: Conquer Ulster
translation: 征服乌尔斯特

original: Ulster sits precariously between the English and the Scots. The Irish people there would be safer under our protection.
translation: 乌尔斯特在英格兰与苏格兰的夹缝中坐立难安。那里的爱尔兰人民将会因为我们的保护而更安心。

original: Conquer Leinster
translation: 征服伦斯特

original: Leinster lies in the shadow of the English crown, its Earls struggling to maintain their independence. We will only be able to resist the English if we unify them.
translation: 伦斯特笼罩在英格兰王权的阴影下，它的伯爵努力维持的自己的独立。只有把他们统一起来才能抵抗英格兰。

original: Conquer Munster
translation: 征服芒斯特

original: The clans of Munster fight among themselves over petty grudges and regional power. They must put old conflicts behind them and bow to us.
translation: 芒斯特家族之间为小恩怨和地区权力而斗争。他们必须把旧的冲突抛在脑后，向我们鞠躬。

original: Conquer Connacht
translation: 征服康诺特

original: The clans of Connacht believe themselves safe from English rule due to the long absence of their armies. This will not last. We must take these lands in preparation to resist the inevitable English return.
translation: 康洛特天真的认为由于他们的军队长期的缺阵将不会遭到英格兰的统治。这种情况不会持续下去，我们必须先夺取这块地区在英格兰下手之前。

original: Unite the Clans
translation: 联合氏族

original: All the clans of Ireland must be united under our rule. There shall be a High King once more.
translation: 爱尔兰的所有部族都必须在我们的统治下团结起来。将有一位伟大的国王再次卷土重来。

original: Beyond the Pale
translation: 打破藩篱

original: At last Ireland is united under one ruler. It is time to turn our attention to the last bastion of English rule.
translation: 爱尔兰终于获得了统一。是时候把我们的注意力转向英格兰了。

original: Conquer Wales
translation: 征服威尔士

original: The Welsh people once resisted English rule. Through cowardice and disunity they were subjugated. We will not repeat their mistakes.
translation: 威尔士人曾经抵制过英格兰的统治。因为怯懦和不团结，他们被征服了。我们不会重复他们的错误。

original: Invade England
translation: 入侵英格兰

original: England itself is now open to us. It's time to give them a taste of their own medicine.
translation: 英格兰的后门对我们敞开。是时候让他们尝尝自己的滋味了。

original: Conquer the Highlands
translation: 征服高地

original: Centuries ago the Highlands were dotted with Irish religious settlements. They should enjoy Irish patronage once again.
translation: 几个世纪前，高地地区到处都是爱尔兰宗教聚居地。他们应该再次享受爱尔兰的庇护。

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! or their subjects own at least §Y2§! provinces in the Kingdom of the Isles area
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!或它的附属国在群岛地区至少拥有 §Y2§! 个省份

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! or their subjects own at least §Y4§! provinces in the Highlands area
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!或它的附属国在高地地区至少拥有 §Y4§! 个省份

original: Conquer Scotland
translation: 征服苏格兰

original: Scotland stands the the way of our conquest of Britain. Their feeble attempts to resist English rule cannot go on forever, so it is only right that they should instead embrace our protection.
translation: 苏格兰站在我们征服英国的道路上。他们不可能永远无力的抵抗英格兰，因此，他们应该接受我们的保护，这显然是正确的。

original: Rule Britannia
translation: 统治不列颠尼亚

original: All the British Isles shall be our domain. We will rule Britannia.
translation: 整个不列颠群岛都是我们的囊中之物。我们会统治不列颠尼亚。

original: Foundation of Trinity College
translation: 建立圣三一学院

original: Now that Dublin is under Irish rule once more, it would be an excellent place to found our first university.
translation: 现在都柏林又一次被爱尔兰统治，这将是建立我们第一所大学的好地方。

original: Irish America
translation: 爱尔兰裔美国人

original: The Irish people are not immune to the allure of the New World. Many wish to migrate there in search of land and wealth. Perhaps in generations to come, the peoples of the Americas will proudly boast of their Irish heritage.
translation: 爱尔兰人民也受不了新大陆的诱惑。许多人希望迁移到那里寻找土地和财富。也许在今后几代人中，美洲各国人民将自豪地夸耀他们的爱尔兰传统。

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! or their subjects own at least §Y5§! fully colonized provinces in the Colonial Eastern America colonial region
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§! 或它的附庸至少拥有§Y5§!个东美洲殖民省份。

original: Import Potatoes
translation: 进口马铃薯

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! or their subjects own at least §Y15§! fully colonized provinces in North America or New World continent
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§! 或它的附庸至少拥有 §Y15§!个完全殖民省份在北美洲或新大陆大洲。

original: We have discovered a curious tuber in the New World. Having given up on attempts to smoke it, we have learned that it would make an ideal staple crop to grow back home in Ireland. Even small families would be able to easily grow enough to survive.
translation: 我们在新大陆发现了一个奇怪的植物。我们放弃了将它当做烟料的尝试，它将成为爱尔兰的一种理想的主食作物。就算是小家庭，也很容易种植它们。

original: Reconquer Normandy
translation: 收复诺曼底

original: The Duchy of Normandy is a de jure subject of the Kingdom of France. It should be returend to our rule.
translation: 诺曼底公国是法兰西的法理领土，它应该归还给我们统治。

original: Subjugate Brittany
translation: 征服布列塔尼

original: The Duchy of Brittany is not recognizing their proper relationship with the French Crown. We should persuade them to return to the fold.
translation: 布列塔尼公国还未正确认识其与法兰西国王的关系。是时候说服这只迷途小羊回到羊圈了。

original: Conquer Picardy
translation: 征服皮卡第

original: Picardy is a wealthy region, once part of France but now divorced from our rule. We should reclaim it.
translation: 皮卡第是一个富裕的地区，曾经是法国的一部分，但现在却脱离了我们的统治。我们应该收回它。

original: Conquer Flanders
translation: 征服佛兰德

original: The Duchy of Flanders has over the centuries shifted in allegiance between France, the Holy Roman Empire, and the upstart Duchy of Burgundy. It should be returned to France permanently.
translation: 几个世纪以来，佛兰德斯在法兰西、神圣罗马帝国和勃艮第之间辗转效忠。现在应该让他们知道法兰西是他们唯一的主人。

original: French Naval Power
translation: 扩张法兰西海军

original: France must build a fleet to rival that of England, lest we be stranded on our shores indefinitely.
translation: 法国必须建立一支与英国匹敌的舰队，以免我们无限期地滞留在我们的海岸上。

original: French East Indies
translation: 法属东印度

original: The riches of India are a tempting prize indeed. If we could establish a foothold along the coast, we could dominate trade in the region.
translation: 印度的财富确实十分诱人。如果我们能在沿海建立立足点，我们就能主导该地区的贸易。

original: French Claim to Naples
translation: 法兰西的那不勒斯宣称

original: The Neapolitan succession is a complex and contentious matter. Naples itself aspires to independence, but both France and the Iberian princes stake a claim to it also. This matter must be put to rest.
translation: 那不勒斯的继承是一个复杂而有争议的问题。那不勒斯本身渴望独立，而法兰西和伊比利亚的君主也对它握有宣称。这件事必须得到解决。

original: Reconquer Gascony
translation: 夺回加斯科涅

original: Gascony is rightful French land, occupied by an illegitimate claimant to the crown. Every English foothold in France must be reclaimed.
translation: 加斯科尼是合法的法国土地，如今却被非法宣称者占领。英格兰在法兰西的每个立足点都必须被收回。

original: Conquer Provence
translation: 征服普罗旺斯

original: The Dukes of Provence aspire to much, but achieve little. They would be better off as subjects to France.
translation: 普罗旺斯公爵渴望得到很多，但收效甚微。作为法兰西的一部分，他们会过得更好。

original: Conquer Burgundy
translation: 征服勃艮第

original: The upstart Dukes of Burgundy fancy themselves a great power in their own right, yet in truth they are a mere vassal. We should remind them of this fact.
translation: 勃艮第的暴发户公爵总幻想着凭借自己的力量成为强权，但实际上他们仅仅是我们的封臣。我们应该提醒他们这一事实。

original: Bases in North America
translation: 在北美立足

original: The Compagnie des Marchands are asking for financial support to help establish bases in North America. They say the honor of France demands it.
translation: 商人联盟正在寻求经济援助来在北美建立基地。他们说为了法兰西的荣耀这是必不可少的。

original: Subjugate Lorraine
translation: 征服洛林

original: The Duchy of Lorraine is strategically placed on the frontier between the Empire and France. In case there is future conflict between France and the Empire we would be wise to make the dukes see France as their master.
translation: 洛林公国坐落于的神圣罗马帝国与法兰西的交界处，十分具有战略性。确保洛林公爵视法兰西为主人是明智之举，以防未来法兰西与帝国间的纷争。

original: Annex Savoy
translation: 吞并萨伏依

original: The Duchy of Savoy defends the Italian invasion route into France. To ensure this invasion route is properly protected we must incorporate Savoy into France.
translation: 萨伏依公国阻断了意大利人入侵法兰西的路线。为了确保这条入侵路线的安全，我们必须把萨伏依纳入法兰西的版图。

original: Colonial Expansion
translation: 殖民扩张

original: The glory of France demands that we are the greatest nation in Christendom. Our explorers are seeking royal patronage to go voyages of discovery in the East.
translation: 为了法兰西的荣耀，我们必须是最伟大的天主教国家。我们的探险家们正在寻求王室的赞助以完成东方的探索之旅。

original: Conquer Franconia
translation: 征服法兰克尼亚

original: The House of Wittelsbach was granted various Franconian lands by the Emperor Henry V. It is time that Bavaria took them.
translation: 法兰克尼亚的土地是皇帝亨利五世赐予维特尔斯巴赫家族的。现在是时候由巴伐利亚拿回它们了。

original: Claiming Oberpfalz
translation: 宣称上普法尔茨

original: Upper Palatinate rightfully belongs to the house of Wittelsbach. We must ensure that the Bavarian Wittelsbachs are the ones who have it.
translation: 上普法尔茨法理上属于维特尔斯巴赫家族。我们必须保证巴伐利亚的维特尔斯巴赫家族得到它。

original: Uniting the Wittelsbachs
translation: 统一维特尔斯巴赫家族

original: The Rhenish-Palatinate is our ancestral birthright. It must be restored to its rightful owners.
translation: 莱茵兰-普法尔茨是我们祖先与生俱来的权利。它必须回归其合法的主人。

original: Conquer Lower Swabia
translation: 征服下斯瓦比亚

original: We cannot have any rivals in our own little corner of Germany. The lands of Ansbach legally belong to cadet branch of the Hohenzollern family, we must have them for ourselves.
translation: 我们在自己占据的德国小角落里不能存在任何敌人，安斯巴赫的领土从法律上讲归属于霍亨索伦家族的幼子分支，我们必须征服他们。

original: American Independence
translation: 美国独立

original: Liberty or death!
translation: 不自由毋宁死！

original: Colonize the Kurils
translation: 殖民千岛群岛

original: The son of heaven requests that the islands to the north of Japan be settled with landless Ronin for the peace of the Emperor.
translation: 天皇要求无土的浪人去日本北方的岛屿定居，这样可以促进帝国的和平.

original: Invade Manchuria
translation: 入侵满洲

original: The wild lands of Manchuria hold great potential if we can civilize its inhabitants. We should establish a foothold there.
translation: 如果我们能教化满洲的原住民，那块荒地将很有价值，我们将会在那里建立据点.

original: Unite Japan
translation: 统一日本

original: Any remaining Daimyos who have not yet submitted to our authority must be brought to heel immediately. Only under a united Japan can we hope to expand beyond the home islands.
translation: 任何还没有向我们投降的大名都必须马上推翻。只有统一日本全境，我们才有希望扩张日本本土以外的岛屿。

original: Conquer Okinawa
translation: 征服琉球

original: The Ryukyu Islands rightly belong to Japan, and must be subjugated!
translation: 琉球群岛理应归属日本，必须征服它！

original: Invade Ireland
translation: 入侵爱尔兰

original: With the discovery of Europe it is vital to gain a foothold from which to launch further conquests. Any Irish province would make a fine base.
translation: 随着欧洲的发现，获得一个立足点来进一步征服是至关重要的。任何一个爱尔兰省份都将成为一个很好的基地。

original: Invade Spain
translation: 入侵西班牙

original: With the discovery of Europe, taking any province in Iberia would make an excellent foothold for further expansion.
translation: 随着欧洲的发现，伊比利亚的任何省份都将成为进一步扩张的绝佳立足点。

original: Invade France
translation: 入侵法兰西

original: Following the discovery of Europe, a foothold in any French province could offer opportunities for further expansion.
translation: 随着欧洲的发现，在任何一个法国省份的立足点都可以提供进一步扩张的机会。

original: Conquer Britain
translation: 征服不列颠

original: The weather in Britain is most displeasing, but nonetheless, the British will fall under our shadow.
translation: 英国的天气是最令人不快的，但英国人还是会在我们的阴影下。

original: Conquer France
translation: 征服法兰西

original: The French armies will fall before our majestic phalanxes. We're rather fond of the drink they call 'wine', too.
translation: 法国军队将在我们壮丽的方阵面前倒下。我们相当喜欢他们称之为“葡萄酒”的饮料。

original: Conquer Spain
translation: 征服西班牙

original: The Iberian whiteskins make excellent subjects, we surmise that their military ineptitude is down to the baking heat.
translation: 伊比利亚的白皮成为了优秀的臣民，我们推测他们的军事无能是由于酷热的天气。

original: What are Romans?
translation: 罗马人是什么？

original: There's nothing holy about them, that's for sure.
translation: 可以肯定的是，关于他们没有任何神圣可言。

original: Dismantled the so-called 'Holy Roman Empire'.
translation: 废除了所谓的「神圣罗马帝国」。

original: Prepare for War
translation: 战争准备

original: The wheels of war turn slowly. If we are to stand a chance of achieving our goals, we must have sizeable standing forces, plentiful reinforcements, and skilled leaders to direct them.
translation: 战争的车轮转动得很慢。如果我们要实现我们的目标，我们就必须有大量的常备军、大量的援军和经验丰富的领导人来达成我们的目标。

original: Prepare for War
translation: 战争准备

original: The wheels of war turn slowly. If we are to stand a chance of achieving our goals, we must have sizeable standing forces, plentiful reinforcements, and skilled leaders to direct them.
translation: 战争的车轮转动得很慢。如果我们要实现我们的目标，我们就必须有大量的常备军、大量的援军和经验丰富的领导人来达成我们的目标。

original: Prepare for War
translation: 战争准备

original: The wheels of war turn slowly. If we are to stand a chance of achieving our goals, we must have sizeable standing forces, plentiful reinforcements, and skilled leaders to direct them.
translation: 战争的车轮转动得很慢。如果我们要实现我们的目标，我们就必须有大量的常备军、大量的援军和经验丰富的领导人来达成我们的目标。

original: Prepare for Conquest
translation: 征战准备

original: The wheels of war turn slowly. If we are to stand a chance of achieving our goals, we must have sizeable standing forces, plentiful reinforcements, and skilled leaders to direct them.
translation: 战争的车轮转动得很慢。如果我们要实现我们的目标，我们就必须有大量的常备军、大量的援军和经验丰富的领导人来达成我们的目标。

original: Prepare for Conquest
translation: 征战准备

original: The wheels of war turn slowly. If we are to stand a chance of achieving our goals, we must have sizeable standing forces, plentiful reinforcements, and skilled leaders to direct them.
translation: 战争的车轮转动得很慢。如果我们要实现我们的目标，我们就必须有大量的常备军、大量的援军和经验丰富的领导人来达成我们的目标。

original: Prepare for Reconquest
translation: 重夺准备

original: The wheels of war turn slowly. If we are to stand a chance of achieving our goals, we must have sizeable standing forces, plentiful reinforcements, and skilled leaders to direct them.
translation: 战争的车轮转动得很慢。如果我们要实现我们的目标，我们就必须有大量的常备军、大量的援军和经验丰富的领导人来达成我们的目标。

original: Prepare for War
translation: 征战准备

original: The surrounding kingdoms squabble and fight between themselves. What we need is an army to unite the disparate nations of Peru.
translation: 周围的王国互相争斗，互相争斗。我们所需要的是一支军队来团结有着不同国家的秘鲁。

original: Conquer Batinah
translation: 征服巴提奈

original: Foreign powers still control the most fertile region of Oman, the Batinah, which stretches between the Gulf of Oman and the Al Hajar Mountains. We must seize the Batinah, both to control the plain itself and to secure control over the trade cities that dot the Omani coastline along the Persian Gulf.
translation: 外国势力仍然控制着阿曼最肥沃的地区巴蒂纳，巴蒂纳位于阿曼湾和哈贾尔山脉之间。我们必须夺取巴蒂纳，既控制平原本身，又控制遍布波斯湾沿岸阿曼海岸线的贸易城市。

original: Control of Dhofar
translation: 支配佐法尔

original: Control over Dhofar has long been an objective for our people. Both to better protect ourselves against the Kathiri and Mahra, and to experience the fabled Frankincense the region exports.
translation: 控制霍法尔长期以来一直是我国人民的目标。既能更好地保护自己不受卡蒂里和马赫拉的影响，又能享受传说中的弗朗金森斯地区出口。

original: Conquer Mombasa
translation: 征服蒙巴萨

original: The city of Mombasa is a major East African trading hub and would make a valuable addition to any maritime empire. Some of the Swahili merchants in Mombasa have recently made contact with us asking for our protection. It is our duty to oblige.
translation: 蒙巴萨市是东非主要的贸易中心，对任何海洋帝国都将是一个有价值的补充。蒙巴萨的一些斯瓦希里商人最近与我们取得了联系，要求我们提供保护。我们有义务去做。

original: Conquest of Zanzibar
translation: 征服桑给巴尔

original: Zanzibar Island is in many ways optimally positioned to control the Swahili coastline. Let us invade and seize this island as a stepping stone to controlling the entirety of the East African market.
translation: 桑给巴尔岛在许多方面处于控制斯瓦希里群岛海岸线的最佳位置。让我们入侵并占领这个岛屿，作为控制整个东非市场的踏脚石。

original: Conquer Hetu Ala
translation: 征服赫图阿拉

original: The nomads in the North pillage and ransack our villages. Fabricate a claim on their territory, then drive them out.
translation: 北方的游牧民族掠夺和洗劫我们的村庄。在他们的领土伪造主权，然后赶走他们。

original: Conquer Huncun
translation: 征服珲春

original: The nomads continue their raids. Their territory once belonged to the Goguryeo Empire, and by extension, should belong to us.
translation: 游牧民继续他们的袭击。他们的领土曾经属于高句丽帝国，因此应该属于我们。

original: Restore Goguryeo
translation: 光复高句丽

original: For nearly a thousand years, the territory of the ancient Empire of Goguryeo has been squabbled over and ransacked. We should bring it under our banner.
translation: 在将近一千年的时间里，古代高句丽帝国的疆土一直为争夺和洗劫而争吵不休。我们应该把它放在我们的旗帜下。

original: Conquer Al Jazira
translation: 征服杰兹拉

original: Our ancestors once ruled all of Upper Mesopotamia. It is our duty to restore this birthright and once again show the world the glory of the Ayyubid Dynasty.
translation: 我们的祖先曾经统治过上美索不达米亚的所有地区。我们有责任恢复这一与生俱来的权利，并再次向世界展示阿尤布王朝的荣耀。

original: Reconquer Aleppo
translation: 收复阿勒颇

original: The lands of Northern Syria were once an integral part of the Ayyubid realm and the seat of one of the influential branches of our dynasty. It is time we reclaim it.
translation: 叙利亚北部的土地曾经是阿尤布王国不可分割的一部分，也是我们王朝一个有影响力的分支的所在地。现在是我们收回它的时候了。

original: End The Sound Toll
translation: 终止海峡税

original: Enough is enough. Controlling two pieces of land by sea divided should not imply control over the trade that passes between and through them. Flatter and woo them, or raze their cities and salt the earth. Either way, our trade shall flow freely from The Baltic through The Kattegat.
translation: 够了就是够了. 控制海峡两岸不表示可以控制通过海峡的贸易. 要么与他们交好，要么用武力打垮他们. 无论如何，我们通过卡特加特海峡的贸易应该自由无阻.

original: Conquest of Champaner
translation: 征服占帕内尔

original: In the hills between Gujarat and the Malwa plateau lies the ancient and seemingly impregnable fortress of Champaner. This fort must become ours so that it can become our first line of defense.
translation: 古吉拉特和马尔瓦高原之间的山丘上，矗立着古老而又看似坚不可摧的香槟要塞。这座堡垒必须成为我们的堡垒，才能成为我们的第一道防线。

original: Integrate Naples
translation: 吞并那不勒斯

original: Naples is subject to Aragonese rule, but we do not rule it directly. It must be fully integrated into Aragon.
translation: 那不勒斯受阿拉贡人的统治，但我们并不能直接管束它。它必须完全融入阿拉贡。

original: The Auld Alliance
translation: 征服艾查捷拉

original: Scotland and France maintain close ties, promising mutual aid against English aggression. As the conflict between nations only seems to be escalating, Scotland must renew its diplomatic ties.
translation: 苏格兰和法国保持着密切的关系，承诺对英国的侵略进行互助。由于国与国之间的冲突似乎正在升级，苏格兰必须恢复外交关系。

original: Advance the Frontier
translation: 推进前线

original: Border skirmishes along the Scottish Marches are frequent and bloody. It is time to put an end to these petty squabbles by seizing the entire region for ourselves.
translation: 在苏格兰边区长期存在血腥而频繁的摩擦与冲突，是时候将这整片地域纳入境内，结束这些小打小闹了！

original: North Sea Consolidation
translation: 统一北海

original: Orkney, Shetland, and Mann are the last of the nearby isles that elude our rule. Though currently held by the kings of England and Norway, we must watch for a chance to incorporate them into Scotland.
translation: 奥克尼，谢特兰，和马恩岛是我们统治外的群岛。 虽然目前被英格兰和挪威的国王拥有，但我们必须密切关注把他们纳入苏格兰的时机。

original: Control Lower Persia
translation: 支配下波斯

original: The verdant territory along the Gulf Coast, stretching up to the Zagros mountains is a key part of the Timurid inheritance. Take it from those who would lay claim to our heritage.
translation: 沿着墨西哥湾青翠沿岸延伸到扎格罗斯山脉的领土是蒂穆里人遗产的关键部分。从那些宣称继承我们遗产的人那里得到它。

original: Control Upper Persia
translation: 支配上波斯

original: The Zagros mountains used to provide a natural border to our land in the West. Ensure that these borders are restored to us.
translation: 扎格罗斯山脉过去是我们西部土地的天然边界。确保我们恢复这些边界。

original: Control East Khorasan
translation: 支配东呼罗珊

original: The heartlands of our late liege Timur the Lame are central to our heritage. When we possess them all, our claim will have much more merit.
translation: 我们已故的国王蒂穆尔留下的心脏地带是我们遗产的核心。当我们拥有它们的时候，我们的宣称就会有更多的价值。

original: Control West Khorasan
translation: 支配西呼罗珊

original: Stretching towards the exotic lands of India, West Khorasan is vital to the continued success of our kingdom.
translation: 西呼罗珊延伸到印度的异国之地，对我们王国的持续成功至关重要。

original: Control Eastern Steppes
translation: 支配东部草原

original: Although the terrain is arid and lifeless, this land rightfully belongs to us.
translation: 虽然地势干旱，没有生命，但这片土地是属于我们的。

original: Take Western Steppes
translation: 夺取西部草原

original: The Steppes have been argued and fought over for long enough. Let us reunite them under our leadership.
translation: 是时候停止草原部族无尽的纷争吵闹了，让我们领导他们重新团结起来。

original: [Root.GetAdjective] Leadership
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]领导

original: We must safeguard the [Root.GetName] nation safely through the coming storm. Our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] must make it clear that we are the rightful ruler over all petty pretenders to Timur's throne.
translation: 我们必须在即将到来的风暴中保卫[Root.GetName]国家安全。我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]必须表明，我们是帖木儿王位的合法统治者。

original: Prepare for War
translation: 征战准备

original: The great Timur's hordes were a fearsome sight to behold. We cannot hope to reunite his legacy with a pitiful handful of soldiers.
translation: 伟大的帖木儿曾经令所有国家胆寒。我们并不希望它的遗产被一个可怜的士兵拿到手上。

original: Stabilize [Root.GetName]
translation: 稳固[Root.GetName]

original: There is no use attempting conquest unless our nation is stable and ready to deal with anything that may assail us.
translation: 除非我们的国家是稳定的，并且准备好对付任何可能攻击我们的事情，否则试图征服是没有用的。

original: The Riches of India
translation: 印度的财富

original: Across the Khyber Pass lie the temptingly rich plains of the Punjab. Let us walk in the footsteps of our forefathers and invade this region for the greater glory of our dynasty!
translation: 在开伯尔山口的对面，是旁遮普邦富有得惊人的平原。让我们跟随我们祖先的脚步，为了我们王朝的更大荣耀而入侵这个地区！

original: Conquest of Delhi
translation: 征服德里

original: In 1398 the Great Timur sacked and destroyed the city of Delhi for their worship of Idols. It is time to return there and finish the job, Delhi must be conquered and sacked.
translation: 在1398年，伟大的帖木儿劫掠和摧毁了德里整座城市因为对神的崇拜。现在是时候返回那里完成任务的时候了，德里必须被劫掠和摧毁。

original: Monopolize Adriatic Trade
translation: 垄断亚得里亚海贸易

original: Venice should control trade in the entirety of the Adriatic sea, which puts us into conflict with the upstart city of Ragusa.
translation: 威尼斯应该控制亚得里亚海的浩瀚的贸易，这使我们与暴发户城市拉古萨发生冲突。

original: The Mandate of Heaven
translation: 天命

original: Ours is a relatively new dynasty. We must prove that we can withstand the test of time before we march forward.
translation: 我们的王朝是一个相对较新的王朝。在前进之前，我们必须证明我们能够经受住时间的考验。

original: Dominate Rival Jurchens
translation: 支配敌对女真部落

original: Our Jurchen neighbors are constantly at odds with us. At least one of the major tribes must be brought to heel.
translation: 我们的女真邻居总是和我们意见不一致。至少让他们其中一位臣服于我们。

original: Invade China
translation: 入侵中国

original: We must once and for all unite the Manchu peoples, several are allied to the Chinese and have sought shelter in the shadow of their great wall. We must send our banner south and liberate them from bondage.
translation: 我们必须统一满洲人，他们有的与中国人联盟，有的在长城的阴影下寻求保护。我们必须必须向北进军，把他们解放出来。

original: Improve the Han
translation: 处理藩政

original: Daimyo, our Han is in a dilapidated state of disrepair. Farmers and merchants have lost all trust in our currency and in the ability of our domain to repay its debts.
translation: 大名，我们的藩现在处在破旧和失修的状态。农民和商人对我们的货币和偿还债务的能力失去的所有的信任。

original: Enviable Hanami
translation: 令人羡慕的花见

original: Small and frail have the cherry blossoms sprung into bloom this year. Some say that the cold weather is to blame, but others claim that the art of tending to these delicate flowers has passed away from our realm. Increase our cultural tradition, and make our cherry blossoms the envy of Japan.
translation: 今年开放的樱花小而脆弱.一些人认为寒冷的天气是罪魁祸首，但其他人宣称是因为保养这些娇嫩花朵的手艺已在我们国内失传.提高我们的文化传统，让我们的樱花成为全日本的骄傲吧.

original: Liberate Yerevan
translation: 解放埃里温

original: The Armenian mother see of Holy Etchmiadzin still stands strong but the Armenian Copts have not had their own state since the fall of their Kingdoms in 1360 and 1375. Let us liberate the Armenian Copts once and for all under our own banner!
translation: 亚美尼亚母亲看到神圣的埃奇米亚丁仍然屹立不倒，但亚美尼亚科普特人自1360和1375年两次沦陷以来就没有自己的国家。让我们在我们自己的旗帜下一劳永逸地解放亚美尼亚科普特人吧！

original: The Patriarch of Antioch
translation: 安条克牧首

original: Centuries ago Antioch fell to outside invaders and ever since the true patriarch of Antioch has resided in Mardin in Anatolia. We must retake this ancient seat and re-establish the oldest Christian Church in the world in its rightful home.
translation: 几百年前安条克落入外来侵略者手中，此后安条克真正的先民迁居至安纳托利亚的马尔丁。我们必须重新夺回这个古老的圣座，重新建立起世界上最古老的基督教教堂。

original: Take Lower Hindustan
translation: 夺取下印度斯坦

original: As the logical extension of the great Empire of Timur, we, the Mughals, lay claim to all of India. The warriors of the Steppe shall seek out new riches.
translation: 作为伟大的帖木儿帝国的合法继承者，我们莫卧儿人对整个印度都有主权。草原的战士将寻找新的财富。

original: Seize Gujarat
translation: 夺取古吉拉特

original: The Indus river flows from countless tributaries and mountain springs, and into the Arabian Sea. Needless to say, wealth flows freely on the Indus. Make it ours.
translation: 印度河流经无数支流和山泉，流入阿拉伯海。不用说，财富在印度河上自由流动。让它成为我们的。

original: Conquer Malwa
translation: 征服马尔瓦

original: The volcanic plateau upon which Malwa sits, is luscious, dense and green. There is no better farmland in all of India.
translation: 摩腊婆所处的火山高原是甘美的、浓密的、绿油油的。整个印度没有比这更好的农田了。

original: Take North Bengal
translation: 夺取北孟加拉

original: This land rightfully belongs to us. Evict the squatting nobles, and burn them at the stake.
translation: 这片土地是属于我们的。驱逐那些爬下的贵族，把他们烧死在木桩上。

original: Seize South Bengal
translation: 夺取南孟加拉

original: The Bengal delta is a steamy, jungled area, fit for little but farming. Nonetheless, we have claimed it as our own, and our own it shall be.
translation: 孟加拉三角洲是一个热气腾腾的丛林地带，只适合耕种。尽管如此，我们已经宣称它是我们自己的，我们自己的也将如此。

original: The Slave Trade
translation: 黑奴贸易

original: Slavery is ubiquitous in Africa. We should either monopolize the slave trade or seek to end the barbaric practice entirely.
translation: 奴隶制在非洲普遍存在。我们要么垄断奴隶贸易，要么寻求彻底结束野蛮的做法。

original: African Modernization
translation: 非洲现代化

original: European colonialism threatens to wipe out our nation if we do not adapt rapidly. We must have the technology and state apparatus to challenge them.
translation: 如果我们不迅速适应，欧洲殖民主义威胁要消灭我们的国家。 我们必须有技术和国家的设备来挑战他们。

original: Wealth of Africa
translation: 非洲财富

original: Africa is rich in gold, coffee, and ivory. We should ensure that we control at least our fair share of these valuable goods so that we might establish economic independence.
translation: 非洲盛产黄金、咖啡和象牙。我们应确保至少控制我们在这些宝贵货物中的公平份额，以便我们能够建立经济独立。

original: New World Modernization
translation: 新大陆现代化

original: European colonialism threatens to wipe out our nation if we do not adapt rapidly. We must have the technology and state apparatus to challenge them.
translation: 如果我们不迅速适应，欧洲殖民主义威胁要消灭我们的国家。 我们必须有技术和国家的设备来挑战他们。

original: Drive out the Europeans
translation: 赶走欧洲人

original: The invading Europeans are rapidly conquering the New World, and are even expanding into our traditional homes. They must be driven back to their ships.
translation: 入侵的欧洲人正在迅速征服新大陆，甚至扩展到我们的传统家园。他们必须被赶回他们的船上。

original: No European nation or their colonies own provinces in your capital region.
translation: 在你的首都地区没有欧洲国家或者它们的殖民省份。

original: Sunset Invasion
translation: 日落入侵

original: The invaders have fled from our lands. But is that enough? At any time they might return with even more terrible force. Let us pursue them back to Europe itself.
translation: 入侵者已经从我们的土地上逃走了。但这就足够了吗？他们随时可能带着更可怕的力量回来。让我们把它们赶回欧洲。

original: Global Dominance
translation: 主导全球贸易

original: The acquisition of wealth is one thing; but being wealthier than all others, is a sign of true mastery. Grow our home trade node, and own a controlling stake in it.
translation: 财富的获取是一回事，但比所有其他人都富有，是真正掌握财富的标志。发展我们的本埠贸易节点，并拥有它的主导权。

original: Faith's Bastion
translation: 守护信仰

original: Heresy must not be tolerated. The [Root.Religion.GetName] Church needs a pious role-model to light the way.
translation: 决不能容忍异端邪说。教会需要一个虔诚的榜样来照亮道路。

original: Imperial Ambition
translation: 帝国雄心

original: Like all Princes of the Holy Roman Empire, we have our eye on the throne. We should stir up some support from the electorate.
translation: 就像神圣罗马帝国所有的诸侯一样，我们也关注着皇位。我们应该争取选帝侯的支持。

original: Have at least §Y2§! Electors backing §Y[Root.GetName]§! to become Emperor.
translation: 至少有§Y2§!名选帝侯支持§Y[Root.GetName]§!成为皇帝。

original: Charlemagne's Legacy
translation: 查理曼遗产

original: In times immemorial, the Carolingian Kings ruled over the great and Holy Roman Empire. Their legacy has not been forgotten, and neither has their ambition. We must be crowned Emperor.
translation: 数百年前，伟大的神圣罗马帝国由加洛林的历代国王统治。他们的遗产未被遗忘，他们的雄心亦然。我们必须加冕成为皇帝。

original: Defend the Empire
translation: 保卫帝国

original: Over the course of time, many of our Princes have foolishly lost territory to the uncivilised nations beyond the Imperial borders. Unfortunately, that makes us look weak. Recover them.
translation: 随着时间的推移，许多我们的君主愚蠢地让帝国的领土落入边境之外的野蛮国家之手。非常不幸，这让我们看起来很虚弱。光复它们。

original: The Spice Trade
translation: 香料贸易

original: Spices of various kinds are highly prized throughout the world. Controlling the global supply of these goods will make us wealthy indeed.
translation: 世界各地都高度重视各种香料。控制这些商品的全球供应，确实会使我们变得富有。

original: The Silk Road
translation: 丝绸之路

original: For centuries, the silk road has been a source of wealth for those who could control a large part of it. It is our turn to enjoy these benefits.
translation: 几个世纪以来，丝绸之路一直是那些能够控制大部分财富的人的财富来源。现在轮到我们享受这些好处了。

original: Integrate Nevers
translation: 吞并讷韦尔

original: Rumour has it that our puppet on the throne of Nevers is a practitioner of black magics. It wouldn't do to associate with such heresy; Nevers is better off brought into the fold.
translation: 有传言说，我们在内维尔王座上的木偶是一位黑魔法的实践者。与这种异端邪说联系在一起是不可能的；内维尔的处境更好一些。

original: A Kingdom Divided
translation: 王国分裂

original: Our holdings in the North and South are extensive, yet the division of our birthright is difficult at best. The Duchys of Lorraine and Barrois are the missing link, and clearly belong under our ownership.
translation: 我们在北方和南方拥有大量财产，但我们对权利的划分看起来却很困难。洛林和巴罗斯是其中缺失的环节，显然它们归我们所有。

original: Control Liege
translation: 支配列日

original: Historically, the Bishopric of Liège has been a strong voice in the Vatican, and in the Holy Roman Empire. By extension, if we were to control this voice, we could better represent our interests.
translation: 历史上，列日主教在梵蒂冈和神圣罗马帝国都是一个强有力的声音。因此，如果我们控制这个声音，我们就能更好地代表我们的利益。

original: Placate Subjects
translation: 安抚附庸

original: As the leader of so many fragile unions, we cannot be seen to have any disloyal subjects. While we consider our claims on Lotharingia, we must ensure that all our partners are bolstered and ready to act.
translation: 作为这么多脆弱工会的领袖，我们不能被认为有任何不忠的臣民。在我们考虑对洛林的宣称时，我们必须确保我们的所有伙伴都得到支持，并准备采取行动。

original: All subjects have less than §Y1.00%§! Liberty Desire
translation: 所有属国的独立倾向必须低于§Y1.00%§!

original: Reclaim Transjurania
translation: 收复巴塞尔

original: The Kingdom of Upper Burgundy has been under the control of the Empire for long enough. In ages past it constituted a full third of Burgundy, and must be returned to us.
translation: 上勃艮第王国在帝国的控制下已经够久了。在过去的几年里，它占勃艮第的三分之一，必须归还给我们。

original: Kingdom of the Arles
translation: 阿尔勒王国

original: The Duchy of Lower Burgundy, once ruled by Richard Justiciarius, who united all of Burgundy under his reign, should be returned to us. The Arelat must be restored!
translation: 下勃艮第公爵，曾经由理查德贾斯蒂里厄斯统治，他在勃艮第统治下团结了整个勃艮第，应该归还给我们。阿雷拉特必须恢复！

original: Frisian Conquest
translation: 征服弗里西亚

original: The rest of the Low Countries region is in thrall to us. Only Frisia remains outside our control - we shall have it for ourselves.
translation: 其他弱小国家地区正受到我们的束缚。只有弗里西亚仍然不受我们的控制--我们应该将它拥有。

original: Conquer Lower Yemen
translation: 征服下也门

original: The port city of Aden and the surrounding area is vitally important to our Yemeni heritage. The trade which flows through the Gulf of Aden can be strategically controlled from here - reclaim this land in our name.
translation: 港口城市亚丁及其周边地区对我们也门的遗产至关重要。流经亚丁湾的贸易可以从战略上加以控制--以我们的名义收回这块土地。

original: Conquer Upper Yemen
translation: 征服上也门

original: Sana'a is truly an ancient city. The estates associated with this historic location must be returned to us.
translation: 那确实是一座古城。与这一历史性地点有关的地产必须归还给我们。

original: Shield of Islam
translation: 伊斯兰之盾

original: Since the time of the Prophet Muhammad - peace be upon him - Islam has been blessed with many strong teachers and leaders. We should add our own dynasty to this list of great protectors.
translation: 自从Prophet Muhammad - 和平时期降临到他身上以来，伊斯兰教受到了许多强有力的老师和领袖的祝福。我们应该把我们自己的王朝加入这个伟大的保护者名单中。

original: The Holy City
translation: 圣城

original: The holy city of Mecca must be liberated for the free access of all who wish to undertake the Hajj. It becomes us to take great care of this wondrous and revered site.
translation: 必须解放圣城麦加，使所有希望进行朝圣的人都能自由进入。这就成为我们非常关心这个奇妙和受人尊敬的地方。

original: Production Leader
translation: 生产龙头

original: The lands of Arabia are renowned for various rare and artisanal goods. We should monopolise the production on at least one of them so that we might control their price.
translation: 阿拉伯的土地以各种稀有和手工艺品闻名。我们应该把生产至少垄断其中一个，这样我们就可以控制他们的价格。

original: The Holy Cities
translation: 圣城

original: Mecca and Medina are the holiest sites in Islam. Politics in the region are complex, but we are in a position to subjugate both Sharifs. If we can control both cities under two subjects, there may be an opportunity for consolidation.
translation: 麦加和麦地那是伊斯兰教最神圣的地方。该地区的政治是复杂的，但我们有能力征服这两个地方。如果我们能控制这两座城市臣服于我们，这或许是一次统一的机会。

original: Yemeni Trade
translation: 也门贸易

original: The Gulf of Aden is a very wealthy trade route. If we can expand into Yemen, we could control a significant portion of the global trade in coffee and incense.
translation: 亚丁湾是一条非常富裕的贸易路线。如果我们能扩张到也门，我们就能控制全球咖啡和熏香贸易的很大一部分。

original: Alexandrian Trade
translation: 亚历山大贸易

original: While the great city of Alexandria is under our control, it is infested with Italian merchants who divert its wealth to their own cities. We should either expel these merchants or improve our control of local trade.
translation: 当伟大的亚历山大城在我们的控制之下时，它却充斥着意大利商人，他们将其财富转移到他们自己的城市。我们要么驱逐这些商人，要么加强对当地贸易的控制。

original: Pacify the Bedouins
translation: 安抚贝都因人

original: The nomadic Beduoins of Syria and Arabia are a constant nuisance. They raid our lands almost seasonally and recent Sultans have done little to stop them. They must be brought to heel.
translation: 叙利亚和阿拉伯的游牧民族贝多因人经常令人讨厌。他们几乎是季节性地袭击了我们的土地，而最近的苏丹人也没有采取什么措施来阻止他们。必须使他们屈服。

original: Subjugate the Beyliks
translation: 征服比利克斯

original: The Turkish Beyliks of Anatolia have paid us tribute in the past and acknowledged our overlordship. Now they have delusions of independence despite the mighty Ottoman Sultan breathing down their necks. It is time to reassert our power in Anatolia.
translation: 安纳托利亚的土耳其人君主过去曾向我们朝贡，并承认我们的君臣关系。现在他们有独立的错觉，尽管强大的奥斯曼苏丹对他们垂涎若可。但是现在是重申我们在安纳托利亚的权力的时候了。

original: Crowns of Iberia
translation: 伊比利亚王冠

original: The many crowns of Iberia have lately been divided and consolidated by [Root.GetName] and our neighbor Castile. All of the crowns are connected by a common bloodline and therefore by common claims upon one another. It is time to press our claims on the kingdoms to the west.
translation: 伊比利亚的许多王室最近被[Root.GetName]和我们的邻居卡斯蒂利亚划分和统一。所有的王室都是由一条共同的血脉连接起来的，因此都是通过对彼此的共同要求而联系起来的。是时候把我们对西方王国的宣称强加给西方了。

original: Conquer Athens
translation: 征服雅典

original: The Crown of Aragon has a claim on the Duchy of Athens, which now finds itself imperilled by the Turkish onslaught. Athens, and indeed the Greek people more broadly, would benefit from the return of our protection.
translation: 阿拉贡国王对雅典拥有宣称，现在它发现自己受到土耳其人的打击威胁。雅典，甚至更广泛的希腊人民，将从回归我们的保护当中受益。

original: Subjugate Ryazan
translation: 征服梁赞

original: The Principality of Ryazan no longer see the heirs of Genghis Khan as their overlords. They must be reminded not only through fire and sword but through the rapid expansion of our nation.
translation: 梁赞再也不把成吉思汗的继承人视为他们的霸主了。我们不仅要通过火和剑来提醒他们，而且要通过我们国家的迅速扩张来提醒他们。

original: The Tatar Yoke
translation: 鞑靼枷锁
