translation: 在§Y鲁塞尼亚§!地区拥有的所有省份获得§Y「恢复鲁塞尼亚」§!持续到游戏结束，产生以下效果：\n税收：每年§G+0.50§!\n本地叛乱风险：§G-2§!

original: Poland has elected a new ruler.
translation: 波兰选出了一位新统治者。

original: The Prussian Confederation
translation: 普鲁士联邦

original: The people of West Prussia cry out to be free of Teutonic rule. We must offer them our support in their struggle for liberty.
translation: 西普鲁士的人民日思夜想着摆脱条顿人的统治。我们必须支持他们自由的斗争。

original: Supported the Prussian Confederation
translation: 支持普鲁士联邦

original: Danzig will become our vassal
translation: 但泽将成为我们的附庸国

original:
5 owned provinces:
In the region §YEast Africa§!
Have a §YTrade Station§!
Owned by a Trade Company.
translation:
名下5个省份：
位于§Y东非§!地区
有贸易公司投资§Y贸易公司§!
属于一个贸易公司。

original: Any owned province in the §YEast Africa§! region has a §YCompany Warehouse§! or §YCompany Depot§! Trade Company Investment in its area.
translation: §Y东非§!地区中任何一个控制的省份所在的区域拥有§Y公司货栈§!或§Y公司仓库§!贸易公司投资。

original: The Teutonic Knights were originally invited into Prussia at the request of the Polish Kingdom. Since then they have turned into a problem, the Kights must recognize that these lands are a lawful part of Poland.
translation: 条顿骑士团最初应波兰王国之邀进入普鲁士，但之后他们就变成了大麻烦。骑士们必须认识到这些土地都是波兰的合法领土。

original: In centuries past, before the Mongol Yoke, the fertile lands of the Dniepr were part of the Rus domain. They shall be again.
translation: 几个世纪前，在蒙古枷锁之前，第聂伯河的肥沃土地是罗斯领土的一部分。他们将再次成为我们的一部分。

original: Plus Ultra
translation: 航向更远方

original: What lies beyond the Pillars of Hercules? Our brave explorers are ready to find out!
translation: 海格力斯之柱以外还有什么？我们勇敢的探险家已经准备好去探索了！

original: Discover Caribbean
translation: 发现加勒比

original: It has long been theorized that rather than travel East, we could go West to India. We must put this theory to the test, and search out the ideal landing spot.
translation: 长期以来，人们一直认为，与其向东旅行，我们还可以到西方去印度。我们必须对这一理论进行检验，并寻找理想的着陆点。

original: Caribbean Colony
translation: 加勒比殖民地

original: The natives on our newfound territory of Hispaniola are friendly, pleasant, and most importantly, gullible. We should claim this region as our own by planting more [Root.GetAdjective] boots on the ground.
translation: 我们新发现的伊斯帕尼奥拉地区的土著人相当友善，最重要的是容易上当。我们应该通过建立更多的[Root.GetAdjective]军队来宣称这个地区是我们自己的。

original: The Spanish Main
translation: 新西班牙大陆

original: The Main, as it has become known, can be sighted from the decks of our trade ships before they dock at Hispaniola. If the prosperity of the Caribbean is any indication, it would be worth exploring the Main thoroughly.
translation: 据了解，在停靠在伊斯帕尼奥拉岛之前，可以从我们的商船的甲板上看到，如果加勒比有任何繁荣的迹象，那么就应该彻底地探索。

original: Establish La Plata
translation: 建立拉普拉塔

original: The verdant landscape of South America should make an excellent site for a new colonial venture.
translation: 南美洲的绿野美景将会成为新的殖民探险中一处绝佳的地点。

original: Aztec Conquest
translation: 征服阿兹特克

original: The system of entrada mandates that the self-proclaimed Aztec Empire belongs to us. Seize their land, and bring their gold back to [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 我们已经被授予特权进入自称阿兹特克帝国的国家，掠夺他们的土地，将他们的黄金带回[Root.Capital.GetName]。

original: Incan Hoards
translation: 印加的财富

original: The Inca fill their temples with gold, yet seem unaware of simply how much power this wealth commands. Their territory, as well as the gold, would be much safer in our hands.
translation: 印加人用金子填满了他们的庙宇，却似乎不知道这些财富的力量有多大。他们的领土，以及黄金，将更安全地掌握在我们手中。

original: Conquer the Inca
translation: 征服印加

original: The treasure that awaits in the mountains of Peru makes all the bloodshed seem worthwhile. We should press on and claim further glory for [Root.GetName].
translation: 在秘鲁山区的宝藏使所有的流血事件看起来都是值得的。我们应该继续为[Root.GetName]争取更多的荣誉。

original: Prepare Reconquista
translation: 准备收复失地

original: For too long have we failed in our duty of care to the peoples of Iberia. We should prepare to unite them under one banner.
translation: 长久以来，我们没有履行庇护伊比利亚人民的职责。是时候做把他们团结在同一旗帜之下的准备了。

original: Reclaim Andalucia
translation: 收复安达卢西亚

original: The Moors have enjoyed our patience for hundreds of years. Remove them and reclaim Andalucia for the [Root.GetAdjective] Crown.
translation: 摩尔人已经享受了我们的容忍长达数百年。驱逐他们，以[Root.GetAdjective]之名收复安达卢西亚。

original: Recover Portugal
translation: 光复葡萄牙

original: The Kingdom of the Spains belongs to us. This includes our erstwhile neighbor, Portugal. Strip them of title, and return sovereignty to [Root.GetName].
translation: 西班牙王国属于我们。这包括了我们曾经的邻居，葡萄牙。剥夺他们的头衔，将主权归还给[Root.GetName]。

original: Claims in Aragon
translation: 宣称阿拉贡

original: A great deal of Aragonese territory was once ruled by [Root.GetName]. By force or by cunning, we must make it ours once again.
translation: 大量的阿拉贡的领土都曾经被[Root.GetName]统治。无论是使用武力抑或诡计，我们必须使它们再度回归。

original: Continue Reconquista
translation: 继续收复失地

original: Further to our claims in Iberia, we should establish our presence in a few cities in North Africa to protect against invasion.
translation: 在索取了伊比利亚后，我们应该在北非的一些城市确立我们的存在以防止入侵。

original: Convert Iberia
translation: 改变伊比利亚的信仰

original: The rest of Europe looks on disapprovingly as we appear to harbor heresy in our midst. Restore our misguided brothers to the one true faith.
translation: 由于我们内部似乎藏匿着异端邪说，我们被其他欧洲国家另眼相看。让我们误入歧途的兄弟恢复唯一的真正信仰。

original: Italian Ambition
translation: 意大利野心

original: Italy is rich and ripe for the taking. Like so many before us, we will stake out our part of Italy, and reap its riches for ourselves.
translation: 掌握意大利就是掌握富饶与成熟。就像我们之前的许多人一样，我们将关注属于我们的那部分意大利，并为自己收获它的财富。

original: Found Havana
translation: 发现哈瓦那

original: Cuba is the largest of the Caribbean islands and the one with the most abundant supply of native slaves to work our plantations. We must establish colonies there, and build a city in the natural harbor of the Havana Bay.
translation: 古巴是加勒比海岛屿中最大的岛屿，也是土著奴隶供应最多的一个，可供我们的种植园使用。 我们必须在那里建立殖民地，并在哈瓦那湾的天然海港建造一座城市。

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! or their subjects own at least §Y5§! fully colonized provinces in the §YEast Cuba§! and §YWest Cuba§! areas.
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!或它的附庸至少拥有§Y5§!个§Y东古巴§!和§Y西古巴§!地区的省份。

original: Mayan Conquest
translation: 征服玛雅

original: The explorers we sent to the Yucatan return with tales of a mysterious fallen civilization. Once a great League that ruled over the entire Peninsula, these Mayans have been reduced to feuding city-states ripe for Spanish conquest.
translation: 我们派往尤卡坦的探险家带回了神秘的失落文明的传说。这些玛雅人曾经建立了一个统治整个半岛的伟大联盟，但现在他们已经分裂为互相敌对的城邦，西班牙征服的时机已经成熟了。

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! or their subjects own all colonized provinces in the §YCentral America§! region
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!或它的附庸拥有所有§Y中美洲§!的殖民省份

original: Subjugate Navarra
translation: 征服纳瓦拉

original: The branch of the House of Trastámara that rules over the Kingdom of Navarra has begun to show signs of weakness and internal strife. We must settle their disputes by bringing Pamplona firmly under our rule.
translation: 统治纳瓦拉王国的特拉斯塔马拉家族旁支已经开始显示出衰败和内乱的迹象，我们必须把潘普洛纳牢牢地置于我们的统治之下以解决他们的争端。

original: Expel the Moriscos
translation: 驱逐摩尔人

original: Though the former Muslims of Andalucia claim to be faithful Christians, we believe that they continue to hold on to their heathen faith in secret. We must root out all traces of impiety and expel from Spain all those who are suspect.
translation: 虽然安达卢西亚的前穆斯林声称自己是虔诚的基督徒，但我们认为他们会秘密地继续坚持他们的异教信仰。我们必须铲除所有渎神的痕迹并将所有嫌疑人从西班牙驱逐出去。

original: Claim Hispaniola
translation: 宣称伊斯帕尼奥拉

original: The island of Hispaniola will be our gateway to the Caribbean and beyond. We must colonize the island and establish religious missions at Santo Domingo to spread the word of God throughout the New World.
translation: 伊斯帕尼奥拉岛将成为我们通往加勒比海及其他地区的门户。 我们必须在岛上殖民并在圣多明各建立宗教修会，向新大陆传播上帝的圣言。

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! or their subjects own at least §Y5§! fully colonized provinces in the §YHaiti§! or §YDominica§! areas.
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!或其属国在§Y海地§!或§Y多米尼加§!地区拥有至少§Y三§!个已殖民省份。

original: Viceroyalty of New Spain
translation: 新西班牙总督区

original: It is time to truly consolidate our rule over the Gulf of Mexico by establishing a permanent and organized colonial Viceroyalty. The Real Audiencia will serve as the highest court in the New World and ensure that the golden riches of Mexico make their way safely to Spain.
translation: 是时候巩固我们在墨西哥湾的统治，组织建立常驻的总督辖区了。皇家审问院将担任新大陆的最高法院，确保墨西哥的黄金可以安全到达西班牙。

original: Fortify Florida
translation: 加固佛罗里达

original: The swampy lands of Florida to the north of New Spain are not rich in gold, but they may prove vital to the future defence of our colonial order. We must settle the region and fortify it.
translation: 新西班牙北部佛罗里达的沼泽地中虽然没有丰富的金矿，但是这片地区对于未来殖民地秩序的保护可能非常重要。我们必须在这个地区移民并建造要塞。

original: Every province owned by §Y[Root.GetName]§! or their subjects in the §YSoutheast§! region or §YWest Florida§! area with a Fort Level of at least §Y3§! gets §YFortified Florida§! for §Y20§! years giving the following effects:\nLocal Defensiveness §G+20%§!
translation: 在§Y北美东南§!地域或§Y西佛罗里达§!地区，§Y[Root.GetName]§!或其属国拥有要塞等级达到 §Y3§! 的省份将获得§Y巩固佛罗里达城防§! §Y20§! 年，给予如下效果：\n当地防御 §G+20%§!

original: Own or have a subject own at least §Y3§! provinces in the §YSoutheast§! region or in the §YWest Florida§! area with a Fort Level of at least §Y3§!.
translation: 在§Y北美东南§!地域或§Y西佛罗里达§!地区，拥有或属国拥有至少 §Y3§! 个要塞等级达到 §Y3§! 的省份。

original: Colonize California
translation: 殖民加利福尼亚

original: Extending our reach into California would be a natural extension of the borders of New Spain. Though unsubstantiated, there are rumours of virgin gold deposits in the region that we must secure, if indeed they exist.
translation: 新西班牙将边境自然扩张到了加利福尼亚。虽然还未证实，但有传言称该地区存在原生金矿，一旦确认，我们就必须保卫它们。

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! or their subjects own at least §Y5§! fully colonized provinces in the §YColonial California§! colonial region.
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!或其属国在§Y加利福尼亚§!殖民区域拥有至少 §Y5§! 个殖民完成的省份。

original: New Kingdom of Granada
translation: 新格拉纳达王国

original: The territories of the southern Spanish Main must be organized into a coherent administrative entity, which we shall name the New Kingdom of Granada. A Royal Audiencia must be appointed to delegate legal authority over the colony from Bogotá.
translation: 西班牙大陆的南方领地有必要组织成一个一致的独立行政体，我们将称其成为新格拉纳达王国。必须指定皇家审问院向授予波哥大的殖民地法定权力。

original: Potosi Silver
translation: 波托西银矿

original: We have discovered silver deposits at Cerro Rico that are rich beyond anything we have ever seen. To extract as much silver as possible, we must not only set the native population to work but also import thousands of African slaves. The value of this silver is estimated to be so great that it far outweighs the cost of buying new slaves, so we should not hesitate to work the slaves to death.
translation: 我们在赛罗里科发现了比我们所见过的任何东西都要丰富的银矿。为了尽可能地开采银矿，我们不仅必须驱赶土著去工作，还应该从非洲进口成千上万的奴隶。这里银矿的价值是那么高，远远超出了购买新的奴隶所要付出的代价，所以我们应该毫不犹豫地驱赶这些奴隶工作到死。

original: Native Reductions
translation: 同化原住民

original: Scholars at the School of Salamanca have forced us to begrudgingly admit that the natives of the Americas are in fact ensouled human beings, and as such are entitled to natural rights. We should consider gathering those natives that still remain and systemically re-educating them rather than simply murdering and enslaving them.
translation: 萨拉曼卡学派的学者正在试图让我们认同那些美洲的原住民也是有着灵魂的人类，并且也应当享有自然权利。我们应当把剩下的这些原住民聚集起来并系统地对他们进行再教育，而不是简单地谋杀他们或把它们变成奴隶。

original: Italian Conquest
translation: 征服意大利

original: By embedding ourselves in the complex web of dynastic diplomacy that is Italian politics, we have spun a plausible story about potential Spanish claims in Tuscany and Milan. Of course this story will do nothing on its own; for that we will need the assistance of our military forces.
translation: 通过融入到家族外交的复杂关系网中参与意大利政治，我们述说了一个有理有据的故事，给予西班牙对托斯卡纳和米兰的潜在宣称。当然这个故事自己做不了什么，为了它我们需要军事力量的援助。

original: Spanish Armada
translation: 西班牙无敌舰队

original: We must be ready to combat the rise of heresy in Europe, and to do so we will need a fleet to rival even that of England. Our Great and Most Fortunate Navy must be able to withstand any foe and any storm.
translation: 我们必须准备与欧洲正在崛起的异端战斗，为此我们需要建立一支舰队与英格兰匹敌。我们的「至伟至幸水师」（即「无敌舰队」的西班牙语直译）务必能够抵抗任何敌军、任何风暴。

original: Invade England
translation: 入侵英格兰

original: We cannot allow the British Isles to fall to heresy! To protect the faith, we must embark our soldiers onto the Armada and set sail for England, where we will attempt to seize the reins of government by force.
translation: 我们不能允许不列颠群岛陷入异端统治。为了守护信仰，我们要将士兵送上舰队运往英格兰，并试图以武力夺取政府的控制权。

original: West African Ports
translation: 西非港口

original: The coast of West Africa is of vital strategic importance. Not only is it essential to establish supply stations for ships sailing around the Cape, but we must also secure a steady supply of African slaves for transport to our colonies in the Americas.
translation: 西非海岸有着极为重要的战略意义。它不仅能为航行至好望角的船只的提供补给，还能为我们的美洲殖民地提供稳定的奴隶来源。

original: Sail to the East Indies
translation: 航向东印度群岛

original: Far to the east are the fabled 'Spice Islands', the source of some of the most sought after goods in Europe such as nutmeg and cloves. We must discover an eastern route to these islands.
translation: 传说中的「香料群岛」远在东方，是肉豆蔻和丁香这些在欧洲最受欢迎的商品的来源。我们必须找到一条通往这片群岛的东方航线。

original: Spanish Netherlands
translation: 西属尼德兰

original: Our claims to Flanders and Wallonia must be enforced, whether by diplomacy or by the sword. In addition, we must combat any heresy that emerges in the Low Countries.
translation: 不管通过外交手段还是战争手段，我们必须得到我们宣称拥有的佛兰德斯和瓦隆。此外，我们必须打击在低地出现的任何异端邪说。

original: The Austrian Succession
translation: 奥地利继承

original: The Habsburgs of Austria have liberally married their offspring into just about every noble house in Europe. While this put them in the good graces of many nations, their policy is a double-edged sword; strategic marriages have united the thrones of many nations, but the fruit of these unions also inherit claims upon Austria itself.
translation: 奥地利的哈布斯堡家族将他们的后代自由地与欧洲几乎所有贵族联姻。虽然这使他们受到许多国家的青睐，但这个政策是一把双刃剑。战略联姻联合了许多国家的王位，结果这些联盟也继承了对奥地利自身的宣称。

original: Universal Monarchy
translation: 君临欧罗巴

original: It is time for Spain to create a universal Catholic monarchy in Europe. To do so we must lay claim to the Imperial Throne of the Holy Roman Empire in perpetuity, abolishing the electors and making the succession hereditary.
translation: 西班牙是时候建立一个全欧洲的天主教君主制国家了。为此，我们必须坚持对神圣罗马帝国的皇位的宣称，废除选帝侯并使王位世袭。

original: Las Islas Filipinas
translation: 菲律宾群岛

original: We have discovered large group of islands, which we have dubbed 'Las Islas Filipinas', that is rich in spices and precious gemstones. The native heathens are divided and unlikely to be able to resist a Spanish invasion. We should launch an expedition with as many men as we can spare to conquer these valuable islands.
translation: 我们发现了大片岛屿富于香料与宝石，并将其命名为「菲律宾群岛」。当地异教徒不太可能联合起来反抗西班牙的扩张。为了征服这些宝贵的岛屿，我们应该抽出尽可能多的人加入探险队。

original: Imperial Cities
translation: 帝都

original: The great cities of Morocco have been neglected for too long. We must restore them to their former glory and decide which of them shall be our capital.
translation: 摩洛哥的大城市长期被忽视。我们必须恢复他们昔日的荣耀，并选择一个作为首都。

original: Saharan Route
translation: 撒哈拉商路

original: By establishing a permanent trade route across the Sahara we would gain access to the riches of West Africa. Though conquest would be our eventual goal, we must first establish a trading presence in the desert.
translation: 我们可以建立一条永久性贸易路线跨越撒哈拉沙漠，以获得西非的财富。虽然征服将是我们最终的目标，但我们必须首先参与沙漠中的贸易。

original: Conquer Timbuktu
translation: 征服廷巴克图

original: It is time to begin the conquest of West Africa. Timbuktu is a wealthy city that sits upon the crossroads of trade between the region and the rest of the world; we must possess it.
translation: 是时候开始征服西非了。廷巴克图是一个富裕的城市，是西非与世界的贸易通衢。我们必须得到这座城市。

original: The Songhai Campaign
translation: 进攻桑海

original: The Songhai cities along the Niger river are wealthy and populated. We must launch a campaign to control the river if we wish to secure our hold on regional trade.
translation: 尼日尔河畔的桑海城市富裕，人口稠密。如果我们希望确保对区域贸易的控制，必须发起一场控制河流的进攻。

original: Invade Mali
translation: 入侵马里

original: Mali controls some of the most abundant gold mines in the known world; these are the true riches of Africa, and they must be ours!
translation: 马里控制着已知世界上一些最丰富的金矿。这些非洲的真正财富，必将属于我们！

original: Conquer Benin
translation: 征服贝宁

original: The slaver cities of the Benin region are ripe for conquest. Though the business of slavery may be unsavory, it is highly profitable.
translation: 征服贝宁地区丰裕的奴隶城市已经时机成熟。虽然奴隶制可能让他们不快，但我们有大笔钱可赚。

original: Raid Iberian Trade
translation: 劫掠伊比利亚贸易

original: A great deal of wealth flows through A'midat Hiraql, the Pillars of Hercules. We should sponsor privateers to raid this shipping and steal this wealth for ourselves.
translation: 大量的财富流经「A'midat Hiraql」，海格力斯之柱。我们应该赞助私掠船袭击航运并将财富据为己有。

original: El Badi Palace
translation: 巴迪宫

original: The Sultan requires a magnificent new palace, and it shall be built with Portuguese coin! We will raid Lisboa and fund this project with the spoils.
translation: 苏丹需要一座宏伟的新宫，它将用葡萄牙金币来建造！我们将袭击里斯本并用战利品资助这项工程。

original: Establish the Black Guard
translation: 建立黑人卫队

original: Now that we control an unending source of African slaves, we can forge them into an army. We should secure the supply of slaves and establish camps to train them as soldiers. Without any tribal loyalty, they will serve the state with absolute dedication.
translation: 现在我们控制了一个稳定的非奴来源，我们可以强迫他们加入军队。但我们需要确保奴隶的补给，并建立一个可以训练奴隶士兵的营地。如果他们丧失了对部落的忠诚，他们将会全心全意的为国家服务。

original: Invade Kanem
translation: 入侵卡奈姆

original: The Empire of Kanem was once mighty; though it has fallen into relative decline, its territory is far from useless. We must extend our campaign further east.
translation: 卡奈姆帝国雄霸一时，却已经日渐衰落，而它的领土远非无用。我们必须向东扩展我们的战线。

original: Reconquer Ceuta
translation: 收复休达

original: The city of Ceuta fell to the Portuguese decades ago. We must show the Christian kingdoms that we will not accept these incursions into our territory.
translation: 几十年休达城沦陷于葡萄牙人之手。我们必须让基督教王国们知道我们决不允许任何人侵略我们的土地。

original: Conquer Algiers
translation: 征服阿尔及尔

original: We must extend our control over the coast to the east. Whatever tribes, kingdoms, or pirate strongholds emerge in the region, they must be subordinate to our rule.
translation: 我们必须延伸对海岸东侧的控制。身处此地者，不论是部落，王国还是海盗的据点，他们必须服从我们的规定。

original: Pirate Havens
translation: 海盗的安息所

original: The pirates of North Africa are numerous, but disorganized. We should establish designated ports along the coast where these pirates can find a safe haven from our enemies and bring their plunder to our markets.
translation: 北非的海盗数量巨大，但是组织松散。我们应当沿岸建立一些指定的海港从而让这些海盗们可以找到一些个安全的庇护所来躲避我们的敌人并且为我们的市场带来他们的掠夺品。

original: Raid on Iceland
translation: 劫掠冰岛

original: We have heard of a frozen land far to the north. Though we cannot fathom why, some among the pirates have resolved to raid its fishing towns and enslave their inhabitants. If we can muster the will to do so, we may as well indulge this idea.
translation: 我们曾听说北方有一片冰冻的土地。不知为何我们的一些海盗决定袭击那里的渔村，奴役那里的居民。如果能召集足够的人手支持这个计划，我们就能放手去干。

original: Corsairs of the North Sea
translation: 北海海盗

original: Though Iceland was far from a rich prize, there is plunder to be had in the North Sea. We should seize its islands and use them as bases from which to raid the British Isles and beyond.
translation: 虽然冰岛远非丰饶，但北海里还有很多有价值的目标。我们应该夺取北海中的岛屿，将它们作为袭击不列颠群岛和其他目标的基地。

original: Protect Granada
translation: 保护格拉纳达

original: The Emirate of Granada cannot survive alone; the Christian kingdoms will surely annex it given the opportunity. We must bring the Emir under our protection to secure the last bastion of Islam in Iberia.
translation: 格拉纳达埃米尔国无法独自生存；基督教王国一有机会就会吞并它。我们必须将格拉纳达的埃米尔置于我们的保护之下，确保伊斯兰教在伊比利亚最后的堡垒。

original: Reclaim Andalucia
translation: 收复安达卢西亚

original: Having secured the Emirate of Granada, we should look to reclaim the former empire of Al-Andalus. The Christian reconquista must be reversed, and once more a Muslim Sultan shall rule in the peninsula!
translation: 保证了格拉纳达的安全后，我们应该着眼于重建曾经的安达卢斯帝国。我们必须扭转基督徒的收复失地运动，穆斯林苏丹将再次统治整个半岛！

original: Conquer Tunis
translation: 征服突尼斯

original: Tunis and Tripoli are the last remaining major ports in the Maghreb that we do not control. These too must become part of our domain.
translation: 在马格里布的主要港口中，只有突尼斯和的黎波里不在我们的控制之下。我们必须将它们归于我们的掌控。

original: Claim the Canaries
translation: 宣称加那利群岛

original: The Christians have been showing an unsettling interest in the isles to the west and the ocean beyond. We should seize these isles and discover what has so excited the Christians.
translation: 基督徒们对西方和远洋的群岛表现出令人不安的兴趣。我们应该占领这些岛屿，看看是什么让这些基督徒如此兴奋。

original: Colonize the West
translation: 殖民西方

original: An immense New World to the west has been discovered! We cannot allow the Spaniards to claim it unopposed. Set sail for the New World!
translation: 我们在西方发现了一个广袤的新世界！我们不能允许西班牙人心无旁骛地宣称这片大陆。启航前往新世界吧！

original: New World Power
translation: 新大陆的势力

original: We have established ourselves as a colonial power, but it is not enough to be one among many. We must be the dominant power in the West.
translation: 我们已经确立了自身的殖民势力，但我们不能满足于跻身殖民势力之一。我们必须成为西方新世界的主导力量。

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! or their subjects own at least §Y10§! fully colonized provinces in the Colonial Caribbean colonial region.
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!或它的附庸至少拥有§Y10§!个加勒比殖民省份。

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! or their subjects own at least §Y10§! fully colonized provinces in the Colonial Colombia colonial region.
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!或它的附庸至少拥有§Y10§!个哥伦比亚殖民省份。

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! has a colonial subject with at least §Y25§! fully colonized provinces.
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!拥有一个至少§Y25§!个殖民省份的殖民地属国。

original: Pacify the Berbers
translation: 平定柏柏尔人

original: The tribes of the southern desert have been a constant hindrance to the coastal Sultanates. They must be pacified so that we can turn our attention elsewhere.
translation: 南部沙漠的部落一直是沿岸各苏丹国的一大阻碍。我们必须安抚他们，这样我们才能将注意力转移到其他地方。

original: Own all colonized provinces in the §YFezzan§! area
translation: 拥有§Y费赞§!地区的全部已殖民省份

original: Traverse the Sahara
translation: 穿越撒哈拉

original: We must secure the Saharan trade that passes through Fezzan. If we can establish permanent trade posts along the route, we may gain the opportunity to launch a military campaign deeper into Africa.
translation: 我们必须确保通过费赞的撒哈拉贸易线。如果我们能够沿着这条路线建立永久性贸易站，我们就可能获得深入非洲开展军事行动的机会。

original: Air Strike
translation: 空气斩

original: The Tuaregs of Agadez have established a sizable kingdom on the far side of the Sahara. This fledgeling state is likely vulnerable to invasion from the north; we should seize it to establish a foothold in the south.
translation: 阿加德兹的图阿雷格人在撒哈拉沙漠的另一边建立了一个庞大的王国。这个羽翼未丰的国家很容易遭到北部势力的进攻；我们应该吞并它，将它作为我们在南方的立足点。

original: Conquer Kanem Bornu
translation: 征服卡奈姆-博尔努

original: The lands of Kanem and Bornu were once united as one nation, but that empire has since fallen into disarray. We should exploit this vulnerability and invade the territories surrounding Lake Tchad.
translation: 卡奈姆和博尔努的领土曾经被统合成一个国家，但此后这个帝国仍然处于混乱之中。我们应该利用这个弱点并入侵乍得湖周边地区。

original: Raid on Genoa
translation: 劫掠热那亚

original: We have grown rich from raiding Genoese merchant shipping, but we will become richer still if we sack the city itself.
translation: 我们已经通过劫掠热那亚的商船获得了大量财富，但如果我们洗劫这个城市本身，我们将会变得更加富有。

original: Raid on Valencia
translation: 掠夺巴伦西亚

original: We have angered the merchants of Valencia greatly by interfering with their Mediterranean possessions. But we relish the ire of our Christian foes; let us burn Valencia to the ground!
translation: 我们对地中海主权的支配极大的激怒了巴伦西亚的商人。但是我们满怀喜悦地品尝者我们基督徒敌人的愤怒。让我们把瓦伦西亚烧得灰都不剩！

original: Construct a Corsair Fleet
translation: 建造海盗船队

original: The corsairs of Tunis shall be feared throughout the Mediterranean Sea; but first we must construct a fleet of light ships to begin raiding coasts and privateering enemy trade.
translation: 整个地中海都将畏惧突尼斯的海盗；但首先我们必须建造一直由小型船只组成的舰队，由此开始劫掠敌人的海岸和贸易舰队。

original: Seize the Isles
translation: 夺取群岛

original: Reasserting Muslim control over Sicily is a worthy goal, and the islands of the Western Mediterranean would make excellent privateering bases.
translation: 重申穆斯林对西西里岛的主权及控制是极为重要的，西地中海的岛屿将会是一个极佳的海盗基地。

original: Dominate the Mediterranean
translation: 制霸地中海

original: In the Eastern Mediterranean Italian merchants and failed Crusader states cling to their last vestiges of relevance. These islands would be put to better use under our care, so let us seize them!
translation: 东地中海的意大利商人和失败的十字军国家墨守着他们最后的残垣断壁。这些岛屿在我们的控制下将得到更好的利用，我们占领他们吧！

original: Raid on Venice
translation: 劫掠威尼斯

original: The city of Venice is the most prosperous trade hub in the Mediterranean. This means that it is ripe for plunder, so let us prepare an invasion!
translation: 威尼斯城是地中海最繁华的贸易中心。这意味着掠夺的时机已经成熟，准备入侵吧！

original: Control the Barbary Coast
translation: 控制巴巴里海岸

original: The pirates who are drawn to the lawless Barbary Coast are ruthless opportunists. If we conquer the territory they could be easily convinced to enter our service as privateers.
translation: 被吸引到无法无天的巴巴里海岸的海盗们都是无情的机会主义者。如果我们占领那些土地，他们也许会轻易地被说服成为为我们服务的私掠者。

original: Sponsor Piracy
translation: 赞助海盗行为

original: We have recruited a large number of pirates into our employ. It is time to unleash them, letting them wreak havoc upon the shores.
translation: 我们招募了大量海盗。现在是时候解放他们，让他们给海岸带来毁灭了。

original: Moroccan Ports
translation: 摩洛哥的港口

original: The Christian kings of Iberia are intent on stamping out piracy. We must not let them get a foothold in the Maghreb, and to that end we must secure northern Morocco against them.
translation: 伊比利亚的天主教国王想要根绝我们的海盗行为。我们一定不能让他们在马格里布取得立足点，为此我们必须确保北摩洛哥的安全以对抗他们。

original: Ottoman Diplomacy
translation: 奥斯曼外交

original: The Ottoman Turks are a rising power that we must watch closely. We will need to take a stance on their expansion: to support them as allies or to oppose them as rivals.
translation: 奥斯曼土耳其是一支我们必须严加监视的新兴势力。对于他们的扩张我们需要选择立场：作为盟友支持他们或者作为宿敌反对他们。

original: Conquer Alexandria
translation: 征服亚历山大港

original: Alexandria has declined significantly as a trading city under Mamluk rule. We should advance along the eastern coast and occupy the city, restoring it to its former glory.
translation: 在马穆鲁克的统治下，作为贸易城市的亚历山大港显著衰退。我们应该向东方海岸推进并占领这座城市，恢复它昔日的荣光。

original: Patronize Art and Religion
translation: 资助艺术与宗教事务

original: As we plunder the seas for wealth and slaves, we should not neglect to nourish our souls with culture, learning, and faith. To that end we must renovate the Great Mosque at Kairwan and ensure that our people are spiritually content.
translation: 当我们为了财富和奴隶而掠夺海洋时，我们不应忽视用文化、学识和信仰滋养我们的精神。为此目的，我们必须整修开尔万的大清真寺，并确保我们的人民在精神上得到满足。

original: Competitive Advantage
translation: 竞争优势

original: The Berber fleets have been permitted free reign over the mouth of the Meditteranean for too long. It is time we showed them the prowess of the Portuguese Navy.
translation: 柏柏尔舰队被允许在地中海的入洋口自由支配已经太久了。 是向他们展示我们葡萄牙海军实力的时候了。

original: Expand the Buffer Zone
translation: 扩张缓冲地带

original: Our foothold in North Africa is proving useful in the defense of Christendom, but to ensure that it can be held, we must expand the area we hold.
translation: 我们在北非的立脚点在防御基督教世界中变得更加重要，但是为了确保能继续运营，我们必须扩展这片区域。

original: The Cape of Good Hope
translation: 好望角

original: Treacherous waters surround the legendary cape of Africa, but who knows what wonders lie beyond? Our expansion puts great strain on the merchant fleet, and we must be sure to provide them adequate protection.
translation: 传说中，非洲之角周围水域险恶，但是远方的未知持续吸引着我们。我们的扩张给商船舰队带来了巨大的压力，我们必须确保为它们提供充分的保护。

original: Beyond Cape Bojador
translation: 远方的博哈多尔角

original: Our explorers believe that Africa extends but a short way further south and soon we will be able to swing round and find the Kingdom of Prester John. Once we have secured an alliance with the Kingdom we will be able sweep the moors out of the holy land.
translation: 我们的探险家们相信非洲仅是向南延伸了一点，很快我们一转头的功夫就能发现祭祀王约翰王国.一旦能巩固与这个王国关系，我们就一定能把摩尔人赶出这片神圣的土地

original: Colonise West Africa
translation: 殖民西非

original: It appears that Africa is stretching further south than we first believed. Prester John's legendary Kingdom is surely close at hand; Africa surely can't be much bigger than this.
translation: 非洲似乎正向南延伸，超出了我们最初的想象。约翰牧师的传奇王国确实近在咫尺；非洲肯定不会比这更大。

original: Settle in Central Africa
translation: 定居中非

original: Only a few explorers have ventured south from the Ivory Coast, and fewer still have returned. Even so, the riches we have gathered from our exploits in Africa have been astounding. If we send enough men, some are certain to survive.
translation: 只有少数探险家从象牙海岸冒险南下，而返回的人则更少。即使如此，我们从我们在非洲的功绩中获得的财富也令人震惊。如果我们派出足够多的人，一些人肯定会活下来。

original: Control the Shipping Lanes
translation: 控制航线

original: There are few left to challenge our mercantile authority in this region. Nevertheless, we must be seen to exert total control over our own affairs before we continue our journey of exploration Eastwards.
translation: 几乎没有人能挑战我们在这个地区的商业权威。然而，在我们继续向东探索之旅之前，我们必须看到对我们自己事务的全面控制。

original: Shipyards of the East
translation: 东方造船厂

original: No-one knew what we would find on this journey of exploration, but one thing is clear: it is not yet over. We must lay claim to sheltered natural harbors, where our fleets can resupply.
translation: 没有人知道我们在这次探索之旅中会发现什么，但有一点是清楚的：它还没有结束。我们必须要求有庇护的天然港口，在那里我们的舰队可以补给。

original: Brazilian Dominance
translation: 主导巴西

original: To appease the Captains who discovered and partitioned the land, we must push forward and expand our territory in South America.
translation: 为了安抚那些发现和瓜分新大陆的船长们，我们必须推动和扩张我们在南美的领土。

original: Conquer Zanzibar
translation: 征服桑给巴尔

original: The Northern Swahili coast is covered in wealthy trading cities where Indian and Persian merchants come to buy gold and Ivory in exchange for their own cloth and manufactured products. These trader cities are, however, quite precariously situated for someone controling the open seas. Let us conquer these lands and put them firmly under Portuguese control.
translation: 斯瓦希里北部海岸遍布着富饶的贸易城市，在那里印度和波斯的商人团前来采购黄金和象牙，并以布匹和工业品作为交换。然而，面对掌控了这片海域的人时，这些贸易城市的位置相当危险。让我们征服这片土地，将其置于葡萄牙的掌握中。

original: Horn of Africa
translation: 非洲之角

original: Our explorers have at last reached the other side of the Gulf of Aden, where so much spice and other valuables are imported to the Mediterranean. This area must be charted and exploited if we are to bring this wealth to Portugal.
translation: 我们的探险者终于到达了亚丁湾的另一边，那里有这么多香料和其他贵重物品被进口到地中海。如果我们要把这一财富带给葡萄牙，就必须对这一地区进行规划和开发。

original: Conquer Hormuz
translation: 征服霍尔木兹海峡

original: The straits of Hormuz are imperative to control the flow of trade between India, Iran and Arabian Iraq. By seizing control over the island of Hormuz we can dominate local trade and lay claim to the maritime empire it once created.
translation: 霍尔木兹海峡对于控制印度、伊朗和阿拉伯伊拉克之间的贸易流动是必不可少的。通过夺取霍尔木兹岛的控制权，我们可以主导当地的贸易，并对它曾经创建的海洋帝国拥有主权。

original: Enables new Events
translation: 启用新事件

original: Secure Trade
translation: 保护贸易

original: We must move to establish our primacy in the markets of the East. With control over the flow of exotic wares, those who do business with us in the West will be at our mercy.
translation: 我们必须采取行动，确立我们在东方市场的主导地位。有了对外来商品流动的控制，那些在西方与我们做生意的人将任由我们摆布。

original: Settle Indonesia
translation: 定居印度尼西亚

original: We have heard tales that the Spice islands lie somewhere to the east. Already daring men are ready to voyage there, all they need is some support from the crown.
translation: 我们已经听闻了香料岛就在东方的某个位置上.勇敢的人们已经准备好探索，需要的只是一点来自王国的援助

original: Go Westward
translation: 向西前进

original: The Winds and currents favor Westward expansion. Our explorers believe that rich lands lie just over the Horizon.
translation: 风和水流对向西推进十分有利，我们的探险家相信那些富饶的土地就在地平线之上。

original: Conquer Tangiers
translation: 征服丹吉尔

original: Our duty to Christendom is clear, we must conquer Tangiers to defend Christendom from the infidel.
translation: 我们对于基督教世界的责任是十分清楚的，我们必须征服丹吉尔来保护基督教世界免受异教徒攻击。

original: Promote the Bandeirantes
translation: 振兴班代兰蒂斯

original: The Bandeirantes are private expeditionaries dedicated to exploring the Brazilian interior in search of natives to enslave. Now however there are whispers that there is gold to be found in the interior, which has caused many among the Bandeirantes to diversify their interests. We should sponsor their expeditions so that as many sources of gold are discovered as possible.
translation: 班代兰特人是私人探险家，致力于探索巴西内陆地区，以寻找当地的奴隶。而现在又出现了在内陆发现黄金的传闻，这导致许多班代兰特人转移了兴趣。我们应该赞助他们的探险活动，以便尽可能多地发现黄金的来源。

original: §YIncreased chance of discovering Gold.§!
translation: §Y发现黄金的几率提升了。§!

original: Establish Jesuit Missions
translation: 设立耶稣会教会

original: We must not ignore the spiritual goals of our conquest of the New World; we are here not only for profit, but for the sake of enlightening the heathen peoples who call this land home. To that end we should invite Jesuit priests to establish missions in Brazil, educating the natives in the way of God so that they will abandon their savage customs.
translation: 我们决不能忽视我们征服新大陆的精神目标；我们来到这里不仅是为了谋利，而且是为了启发把这片土地称为家园的异教徒人民。为此，我们应邀请耶稣会牧师在巴西设立教会，用上帝的方式教育土著人，使他们放弃野蛮的习俗。

original: §Y7§! states in §YColonial Brazil§! owned by you or your non-tributary subjects have an assigned Holy Order.
translation: 在§Y巴西殖民区域§!有§Y7§!个你或你的非朝贡属国的直属州已经设立了修会。

original: Wine Monopolies
translation: 酒类垄断

original: The import and export of wine is tightly controlled in many Atlantic ports. We should do everything in our power to secure trade agreements that grant us monopolies on the wine trade in as many ports as possible.
translation: 许多大西洋港口对葡萄酒的进出口实行严格管制。我们应该尽一切努力争取贸易协议，使我们的葡萄酒贸易能够垄断尽可能多的港口。

original: Own or have a subject own at least §Y10§! provinces producing §YWine§! with a §YWorkshop§! or §YCounting House§!.
translation: 自身或属国拥有至少§Y10§!个生产§Y酒类§!并建造了§Y工场§!或§Y会计室§!的省份。

original: Great Trading Houses
translation: 大贸易公司

original: Our decentralized methods of organizing our global trade must be reined in, formalized, and fully accounted for. By establishing centralized Houses of Trade we can ensure that commercial revenues from our merchant ventures are collected efficiently.
translation: 我们全球贸易组织的分散方法必须加以控制、正式化和充分说明。通过建立中央贸易公司，我们可以有效的保障从我们的商业投资中获得商业收入。

original: Arts and Letters
translation: 艺术与文学

original: Portugal must be at the forefront of literary and academic culture in Europe. We must create and expand universities to bring abut a new intellectual golden age in our nation.
translation: 葡萄牙必须站在欧洲文学和学术文化的前列，我们必须建立和扩大大学，为我们的国家带来一个新的知识黄金时代。

original: African Gold
translation: 非洲黄金

original: There is gold to be found in East Africa, and the mines are within reachable distance of our colonies on the coast. We must seize these mines for the glory of Portugal!
translation: 在东非可以找到黄金，而且这些矿山离我们在沿海的殖民地很近。为了葡萄牙的光荣，我们必须抢占这些矿山！

original: Portuguese Ceylon
translation: 葡属锡兰

original: Our trading links with Ceylon have yielded a rather unexpected result; a local prince has died heirless and decreed that his realm should pass into Portuguese care following his death. Alas this transfer of territory will not likely to automatic. If we want to make good on these claims, we may have to fight for them.
translation: 我们与锡兰的贸易关系产生了一个相当出乎意料的结果：一位当地王子去世了，失去了继承权，并下令他的王国在他死后由葡萄牙人照料。遗憾的是，这一领土转移不太可能是自动的。如果我们想要兑现这些要求，我们可能不得不为它们而战。

original: Portuguese Burma
translation: 葡萄牙的缅甸

original: Several entrepots along the Burmese coast control a sizable portion of trade that flows through the Bay of Bengal. To secure our trade dominance in the East, we must control these ports and thus control the commerce that passes through them.
translation: 沿缅甸海岸的几个转口港控制着流经孟加拉湾贸易点相当大一部分的贸易。为了确保我们的东方贸易优势，我们必须控制这些港口，进而控制流经此地的贸易。

original: Portuguese-Burmese Trade
translation: 葡萄牙－缅甸贸易

original: English Alliance
translation: 葡英联盟

original: The alliance between England and Portugal has stood for generations, and must continue to do so for many generations to come.
translation: 英格兰和葡萄牙之间的联盟已经存续了几代人，而且今后我们也将世世代代维持下去。

original: Colonize the Caribbean
translation: 殖民加勒比

original: The Caribbean islands are prime locations for new colonies. We must ensure that as many as possible fall under Portuguese rule.
translation: 加勒比群岛是新殖民地的主要地点。我们必须确保有尽可能多的人接受葡萄牙的统治。

original: Colonial subjects in the §YColonial Caribbean§! colonial region get '§YThriving Caribbean Colony§!' for §Y20 years§!, giving the following effects:\nTrade Efficiency: §G+10%§!
translation: §Y加勒比殖民区域§!的殖民属国获得「§Y兴旺的加勒比殖民领§!」持续§Y20年§!，获得以下效果：\n贸易效率：§G+10%§!

original: Portuguese Malabar
translation: 葡属马拉巴尔

original: We must establish a series of feitorias along the Malabar coast to produce and market the spices that are native and abundant in the region. While we may be able to purchase some of the land, it may ultimately be necessary to seize it by force where we cannot reach an arrangement with the Indian princes.
translation: 我们必须在马拉巴尔海岸建立一系列的商站，以生产和销售该地区丰富的本地香料。虽然我们可以购买一些土地，但最终在我们无法与印度王公达成协议的情况下可能必须以武力夺取这块土地。

original: Control Surat
translation: 控制苏拉特

original: Our merchants have watched Surat hungrily as the fortunes of its rulers waver. We must pay close attention to the political happening of this region and seize an ideal moment to launch an assault on the city.
translation: 我们的商人们贪婪地看着苏拉特的统治者的命运摇摆不定。我们必须密切关注这一地区的政治局势，抓住这一理想时机对这座城市发动攻击。

original: Casa da Índia
translation: 印度事务院

original: It is time to establish an institution that will confirm and enforce our monopolies on all maritime trade leaving India. The Casa da Índia will be the greatest commercial force in all of Asia.
translation: 现在是建立一个机构来确认和加强我们对离开印度的所有海上贸易的垄断的时候了。印度事务院将成为全亚洲最强大的商业力量。

original: Launch a Flagship
translation: 建造旗舰

original: What is a fleet without a flagship? Sailing at the head of our great armada, our flagship will inspire fear and reverence both as an impressive vessel in its own right and as a symbol of Portuguese power.
translation: 没有旗舰的舰队成何体统？为我们的伟大舰队领航，彰显着其本身与葡萄牙的力量，我们令人敬畏的旗舰令人叹为观止。

original: Intervene in Castile
translation: 介入卡斯蒂利亚

original: The Castilian succession has been in question on numerous occasions, and Portuguese intervention has been a deciding factor in the outcome before. Perhaps it is time that we looked to our own interests when next the matter of succession arises.
translation: 卡斯蒂利亚的继承问题争议四起，葡萄牙的干预之前一直是对结果的决定性因素。下次继承危机浮现之时，也许就是我们争取自己利益的时候了。

original: Lusitanian Empire
translation: 卢西塔尼亚帝国

original: While the kings of Castile have occasionally had the arrogance to declare themselves Emperor of all Spain, we will create a true union of the Iberian crowns.
translation: 虽然卡斯蒂利亚的国王有时会傲慢地宣称自己是全西班牙的皇帝，但我们将建立一个真正的伊比利亚共主联盟。

original: Trade with Cathay
translation: 与中国贸易

original: China is a vast nation that is seemingly so abundant in resouces that it needs no trade with the wider world. It will be difficult to convince Chinese rulers that our merchant ventures can be of value to them, but the potential rewards can hardly be understated.
translation: 中国地大物博，不借外夷货物以通有无。虽然难以让中国统治者相信我们的贸易对他们有价值，但潜在的巨大回报不可低估。

original: If [Root.GetName] has good relations with the owner of §YMacau§!, the event §Y'The Purchase of Macau'§! happens\nElse Gain §G3.00§! Mercantilism
translation: 触发§Y“购买澳门”§!事件。

original: Portuguese Oman
translation: 葡萄牙的阿曼

original: The jewel of the former Hormuzi trading empire, Muscat is a well-protected city at the tip of the Arabian Peninsula. We must capture Muscat and fortify it against our rivals.
translation: 马斯喀特是前霍尔木兹贸易帝国的明珠，是阿拉伯半岛尖端的一座保护良好的城市。我们必须占领马斯喀特并建设她以对抗竞争对手。

original: Portuguese Malacca
translation: 葡属马六甲

original: Malacca is the single most important city in the East Indies. Its strategic position guarding the Straits and its long-established legacy as a merchant hub make it extremely desirable; we must ensure that is falls under Portuguese control.
translation: 马六甲是东印度群岛最唯重要的城市。它扼守着海峡的战略地位以及其作为商业中心的悠久传统使其极具吸引力；我们必须确保它处在葡萄牙的控制之下。

original: Trade with Japan
translation: 与日本贸易

original: Suspicious of all strangers, the feudal rulers of Japan are reluctant to allow any merchants the right trade or even land in Japanese ports. We must find a way to overcome their suspicions and become the only European power with a foothold in this exclusive market.
translation: 质疑着所有异乡人，日本的封建统治者不愿允许任何外国商人进行贸易甚至登陆日本。我们必须设法打消他们的怀疑，成为在这个独家市场立足的唯一的欧洲大国。

original: The Triangle Trade
translation: 三角贸易

original: Slaves from Africa are sent to work on plantations in the New World. The products of this slave labour are then shipped back to Europe and sold for an outrageous profit. This is the Atlantic triangle trade, and we must dominate it.
translation: 来自非洲的奴隶被运往新大陆的种植园工作。奴隶生产的产品随后被运回欧洲并以极其可观的利润出售。这就是大西洋三角洲贸易，我们必须主宰它。

original: Every owned province in §YAfrica§! producing §YSlaves§! gets '§YTriangle Trade§!' for §Y20 years§!, giving the following effects:\nGoods Produced: §G+10%§!
translation: 所有在§Y非洲§!拥有§Y奴隶§!产出的省份可获得§Y20年§!的“§Y三角贸易§!”！，产生以下效果：\n商品生产量：§G+10%§!

original: Have §Y5§! States with at least one Trade Company Investment in the §YIndia§! superregion
translation: 在§Y印度§!大区拥有§Y5§!个至少有一项贸易公司投资的州

original: Push to India
translation: 向印度推进

original: Although we can find no signs of the kingdom of Prester John, we can strike a blow at the Moors by wrestling the spice trade into our hands. We must find the Indies so we can do our bit to defend Christendom.
translation: 尽管我们找不到任何线索关于祭祀王约翰的国度，但我们可以通过角逐并掌控香料贸易的支配权来与摩尔人叫板。我们必须找到印度的通路，这样才可以尽我等所能来保卫基督教世界。

original: Onward to Cathay
translation: 向中国前进

original: Ever since the return of Marco Polo we have heard of the wondrous wealth of Cathay. We must establish exactly where this is.
translation: 自从马可波罗回归起我们就听说了中国巨大的财富。我们必须确定它到底在哪里。

original: Consulate of the Sea
translation: 海洋理事会

original: The Consulate of the Sea administers to the maritime commerce of our nation from Valencia. Its ability to enforce its laws however depends on whether it can control the flow of trade in the Western Mediterranean. We must aid the Consulate's efforts by securing the majority of the trade share in the nearby sea.
translation: 海洋领事馆负责管理巴伦西亚的国家海上贸易。然而，其执法能力取决于能否控制西地中海的贸易流量。我们必须通过确保附近海域的大部分贸易份额来帮助领事馆的努力。我们必须确保在邻近海域的贸易份额中拥有大部分的占有率，以便协助领事馆的工作。

original: Valencian Silk
translation: 巴伦西亚丝绸

original: We have managed to attain both the means and the knowledge to produce silk, one of the most sought-after goods in Europe and typically acquired only through participation in the Silk Road, now controlled by our Muslim enemies. We must begin to produce our own silk and establish an exchange, the Llotja de la Seda, where it can be bought and sold for the benefit of our nation.
translation: 我们已经成功地获得了生产丝绸的手段和知识，丝绸是欧洲最受欢迎的商品之一，通常只有通过参与现在由我们的穆斯林敌人控制的丝绸之路才能获得。我们必须开始生产我们自己的丝绸，并建立一个名为Llotja de la Seda的交易所，在那里它可以买卖，以造福我们的国家。

original: Industrial Districts
translation: 工业地区

original: We produce a variety of high-value and manufactured goods; glass, wine, paper, and even silk are counted among our national produce. We must secure monopolies on these goods and develop our manufacturing industries.
translation: 我们生产各种高价值的制成品、玻璃、葡萄酒、纸张，甚至丝绸都加入到我们的国家产品之列。我们必须确保对这些商品的垄断，并发展我们的制造业。

original: §Y10§! owned provinces:\n Have any §YManufactory§!
translation: §Y10§!个拥有的省份：\n拥有任何§Y工厂§!

original: Golden Century
translation: 黄金世纪

original: We must bring about a golden era for our nation that will last for generations. Our wealth and prestige shall eclipse all other nations!
translation: 我们必须为我们的国家带来一个世代相传的黄金时代。我们的财富和声望将使所有其他国家黯然失色！

original: Dominate Genoa
translation: 控制热那亚

original: We have had to compete with Genoese merchants for too long. It's time we brought them to heel permanently and seized their city for ourselves.
translation: 我们与热那亚商人的竞争已经太久了。是时候让他们永久地屈服，为我们自己去占领他们的城市。

original: Control Venice
translation: 控制威尼斯

original: Having wrested Genoa from merchant rule, doing the same in Venice now seems like an achievable goal. If we can both control the city and take over their maritime commerce, we could count ourselves as one of the richest nations in the world.
translation: 从商人统治下夺走热那亚之后，现在在威尼斯实施同样的计划似乎是可以实现的目标。如果我们既能控制这座城市，又能接管他们的海上贸易，那我们就能将自己视为世界上最富有的国家之一。

original: Table of Exchange
translation: 交换表

original: Banking practices are evolving rapidly as commerce becomes more sophisticated. We must ensure that our own banks have enough gold in their vaults to fund the continued expansion of our nation's interests.
translation: 随着商业变得更加复杂，银行业务正在迅速发展。我们必须确保我们自己的银行有足够的金库，为我们国家利益的持续扩张提供资金。

original: Guilds of Barcelona
translation: 巴塞罗那行会

original: The Guilds of Barcelona have always been influential in the city. We must secure their loyalty, as well as the loyalty of similar guilds in our realm.
translation: 巴塞罗那行会在这座城市一直很有影响力。我们必须确保他们的忠诚，以及我们领域内类似行会的忠诚。

original: [Root.GetAdjective] Navy
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]海军

original: As our realm is divided across the Mediterranean, we must make the construction of a fleet our utmost priority. If we cannot secure dominance on the water, our enemies will have free reign to plunder and capture our territories.
translation: 由于我们的领土横跨地中海，我们必须把建设一支舰队作为我们的最高优先事项。如果我们不能取得在水上的支配权，那我们的敌人就可以自由地掠夺和占领我们的领土。

original: Combat Barbary Piracy
translation: 打击巴巴里海盗

original: The piratical slavers operating out of the North African coast are a constant menace to our coasts and our shipping. We must capture these corsair cities and end the threat they pose to innocent Christians.
translation: 在北非海岸活动的海盗奴隶贩子不断威胁着我们的海岸和我们的航运。我们必须占领这些海盗城市，结束他们对无辜基督徒的威胁。

original: Conquer Tunis
translation: 征服突尼斯

original: Tunis is more than a simple pirate port. It is the capital of a rival naval power with ties to the dreaded Turks, and must be destroyed before they can become a greater threat.
translation: 突尼斯不仅仅是一个简单的海盗港口。它是一个与恐怖的土耳其人有联系的敌对海军力量的首都，必须在他们成为更大的威胁之前摧毁它。

original: Occupy Alexandria
translation: 占领亚历山大

original: Alexandria was a great city once, but has fallen into decline. As we extend our rule eastwards, we should capture and restore it so that the wealth of Egypt flows into the city.
translation: 亚历山大曾经是一座伟大的城市，但现在已经衰落了。当我们向东扩张我们的统治时，我们应该夺取并恢复它，这样埃及的财富就会流入这座城市。

original: Envoy to Ethiopia
translation: 埃塞俄比亚使节

original: We have finally found the fabled Kingdom of Prester John! The lands of Abyssinia, as we have discovered, are inhabited by many faithful Christians eager to receive our aid against the enemies at their doorstep. We should protect and embolden our distant brothers of the faith.
translation: 我们终于找到了传说中的普雷斯特·约翰王国！正如我们所发现的，许多忠实的基督徒居住在阿比西尼亚的土地上，他们渴望得到我们的帮助，以对付家门口的敌人。我们应该保护和鼓励我们远亲的信心。

original: Any §YChristian§! nation with at least §Y70§! total development and a capital in the §YHorn of Africa§! region has at least §Y100§! opinion of us
translation: 任何首都在§Y非洲之角§!区域的§Y基督教§!国家拥有至少§Y70§!点发展度且对我们的好感度至少§Y100§!

original: Humiliate Provence
translation: 羞辱普罗旺斯

original: The Duke of Provence pretends to be the rightful ruler of both Aragon and Naples. His pretentions should not go unpunished.
translation: 普罗旺斯公爵自诩是阿拉贡和那不勒斯的合法统治者。他自命的意图应该受到惩罚。

original: Invade Occitania
translation: 入侵奥西塔尼亚

original: Sharing a border with the Kingdom of France is a source of anxiety for many nations. We can never be sure that our military or diplomatic efforts will be enough to deter them if they should decide to invade. Instead, we must take the fight to them!
translation: 与法兰西王国接壤是许多国家焦虑的根源。我们永远不能确定，如果他们决定入侵，我们的军事或外交努力是否足以阻止他们。相反，我们必须先向他们发起挑战！

original: Protect Albania
translation: 保护阿尔巴尼亚

original: Skanderbeg's struggle against Turkish rule must be honored. The Albanian people shall be liberated!
translation: 斯坎德培反抗土耳其统治的斗争必须得到尊重。阿尔巴尼亚人将获得解放！

original: City of the World's Desire
translation: 世界渴望之城

original: Constantinople, city of the world's desire, lies within our grasp. The siege will surely be long and arduous, but we must persevere. The city will be ours!
translation: 君士坦丁堡，这个世界渴望的城市，就在我们的掌握之中。围困将是漫长而艰巨的，但我们必须坚持下去。这座城市将属于我们！

original: Mare Nostrum
translation: 我们的海

original: From the Pillars of Hercules to the Sea of Marmara, the Mediterranean shall be ours. Every ship that sails upon its waters shall do so under our laws.
translation: 从赫拉克勒斯之柱到马尔马拉海，地中海将属于我们。凡在这片水域航行的船只，都必须遵守我们的法律。

original: Rule Italy
translation: 统治意大利

original: We must eliminate the last vestiges of resistance to our rule in Italy. Even the Pope must accept our rule.
translation: 我们必须消除抵制我们在意大利统治的最后残余。即使教宗也必须接受我们的统治。

original: Union with Portugal
translation: 联合统治葡萄牙

original: It is time to unite all the Kingdoms of Spain under one monarch, and to do so we must gain the crown of Portugal.
translation: 是时候让西班牙诸王国统一在一个君主之下了，因此我们必须获得葡萄牙的王冠。

original: Vassalize Navarre
translation: 附庸纳瓦拉

original: Both the Kingdoms of Castile and France cast envious eyes on the lands of Navarre. It would be disastrous to [Root.GetName] if these lands fell to either of them so we must be proactive.
translation: 卡斯蒂利亚王国和法兰西王国都把目标投向了纳瓦拉的土地。对于[Root.GetName]来说，这些土地落入任何一方之手都是灾难性的，所以我们必须更加主动。

original: Crowns of Iberia
translation: 伊比利亚王冠

original: The many crowns of Iberia have lately been divided and consolidated by [Root.GetName] and our neighbor Castile. All of the crowns are connected by a common bloodline and therefore by common claims upon one another. It is time to press our claims on the kingdoms to the west.
translation: 伊比利亚的许多王室最近被[Root.GetName]和我们的邻居卡斯蒂利亚瓜分和兼并。所有的王室都是有一个共通的血脉，因此都是通过对彼此的共同主张而联系起来的。现在是时候加强我们在西方诸国的主张了。

original: Integrate Naples
translation: 吞并那不勒斯

original: Naples is subject to Aragonese rule, but we do not rule it directly. It must be fully integrated into Aragon.
translation: 那不勒斯受阿拉贡人的统治，但我们并不能直接管束它。它必须完全融入阿拉贡。

original: Claims on Athens
translation: 宣称雅典

original: The Crown of Aragon has a claim on the Duchy of Athens, which now finds itself imperilled by the Turkish onslaught. Athens, and indeed the Greek people more broadly, would benefit from the return of our protection.
translation: 阿拉贡王室宣称对雅典公爵领地拥有主权，而现在雅典发现自己正处于土耳其侵略的危险之中。雅典，乃至更广泛的希腊人民，将受益于我们的保护。

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! or their subjects own at least §Y10§! fully colonized provinces in the New World.
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!或它的附庸至少拥有§Y10§!个新大陆殖民省份。

original: No independent Christian country with capital in the §YIberia§! region has §Y100§! or more Total Development
translation: 定都§Y伊比利亚§!地区的基督教国家总发展度没有超过§Y100§!以上的。

original: Own §Y5§! provinces in the §YIberia§! region
translation: 拥有§Y5§!个在§Y伊比利亚§!地区的省份

original: Construct a Raiding Fleet
translation: 组建一支突袭舰队

original: The great strength of the Maghreb is its vast stretches of coastline and many natural harbors. We must construct a fleet and prepare a series of raids like nothing seen in the Mediterranean before.
translation: 马格里布最大的优势是其广阔的海岸线和许多天然港口。我们必须组建一支舰队，准备在地中海地区发起一场前所未见的突袭行动。

original: Raid the Mediterranean
translation: 袭击地中海

original: The Christians across the sea will be entirely unprepared for our attack. Let no ship go unharassed, and no fishing village go unplundered!
translation: 海对岸的基督徒面对我们的进攻毫无准备。没有一艘船不被袭击，没有一个渔村不被掠夺！

original: Turkish Diplomacy
translation: 土耳其外交

original: The rising power of the Ottoman Turks must be addressed. Either through alliance or rivalry we must take a firm stance on Ottoman affairs.
translation: 对于奥斯曼土耳其人势力的崛起必须有所行动。无论是结盟还是对抗，我们都必须在奥斯曼事务上采取坚定的立场。

original: Corsairs of the New World
translation: 新大陆的海盗

original: Far across the ocean is a whole new world ripe for conquest and plunder. We must set sail for the West!
translation: 大洋彼岸是一个完全可以征服和掠夺的新世界。我们必须启航向西！

original: Invade Iberia
translation: 入侵伊比利亚

original: Our most dangerous foes are the Spanish Christians to the north, living in domains once controlled by faithul Muslims. It is time to reverse their pathetic 'reconquista'.
translation: 我们最危险的敌人是北方的西班牙基督徒，他们生活在曾经由忠实的穆斯林控制的地区。是时候扭转他们可悲的“再征服”了。

original: Basque Fisheries
translation: 巴斯克渔业

original: The Basque people have a long tradition of fishing. Now that we have reclaimed the coastline we can promote the fishing industry on a state level.
translation: 巴斯克人有悠久的捕鱼传统。既然我们已经收回了海岸线，我们可以在国家层面上促进渔业的发展。

original: North Sea Whaling
translation: 北海捕鲸

original: Whaling is an exceptionally profitable enterprise. We must be prepared to sail far to the north to find whale pods, and if possible establish a trading port in the region.
translation: 捕鲸是一项特别赚钱的事业。我们必须准备好远航去往北方寻找鲸群，并且如果可能的话，在该地区建立一个贸易港口。

original: Terranova
translation: 特拉诺华

original: The richest source of whale oil yet discovered in the world is across the vast ocean to the west, near a land we call Terranova. We must establish a colony on this distant shore.
translation: 世界上发现的最丰富的鲸油资源是在西部广阔的海洋上，靠近一片我们称之为特兰诺瓦的土地。我们必须在这遥远的海岸上建立一个殖民地。

original: Grandbaya Trade
translation: 大海湾贸易

original: We must dominate trade in the Grandbaya and ensure that no other nation controls the most lucrative coasts where our whalers ply their trade.
translation: 我们必须主导大海湾地区的贸易，确保我们捕鲸船贸易航线上能获取最大利益的海岸不被其他国家控制。

original: Reclaim the Coast
translation: 收复海岸

original: The kingdom of Navarra once had a coastline to call its own. The powers that be have cruelly rendered our nation landlocked, cutting us off from the sea and denying us the use of our renowned seafaring traditions. We must rectify this injustice at once.
translation: 纳瓦拉王国曾经有自己的海岸线。这些列强无情地把我们的国家变成了内陆国。使我们与海洋隔绝，并拒绝我们使用我们著名的航海传统。我们必须立即纠正这种不公正现象。

original: Conquer Lapurdi
translation: 征服拉布尔

original: The Basque people of Lapurdi have suffered under English and French tyranny for too long. They must be liberated and placed under the rightful rule of Navarra.
translation: 拉布尔的巴斯克人民在英法两国的暴政下遭受了太久的苦难。他们必须得到解放，并置于纳瓦拉的合法统治之下。

original: Claims in Gascony
translation: 宣称加斯科涅

original: There are landed titles in south-western France that we have hereditary claims upon. We should secure this region militarily so that our claims will be taken seriously.
translation: 在法国西南部，我们有世袭的土地所有权。我们应该在军事上保障这一地区的安全，以便我们的宣称得到认真对待。

original: Union with France
translation: 联统法兰西

original: Our dynatic ties with French nobility have at last paid off; we can make a strong case that our monarch is the rightful heir to the French throne. Of course the sitting monarch does not agree, so they will have to be dethroned before the succession can take place.
translation: 我们王室与法国贵族的关系终于有了回报；我们可以有力地证明，我们的君主是法国王位的合法继承人。当然现在在位的君主不同意，所以在继承之前，必须迫使他们退出。

original: Aragonese Inheritance
translation: 阿拉贡的继承

original: With the death of King Alfons, the crowns of Navarra and Aragon are set to be united under one monarch. We must ensure that Navarra is the senior partner in this union, or else we must seize the Crown of Aragon by force.
translation: 随着阿尔方斯国王的去世，纳瓦拉和阿拉贡的王冠将被统一在一个君主的手中。我们必须确保纳瓦拉是这个联盟的主导者，否则我们必须武力夺取阿拉贡的王位。

original: Dominate Espainia
translation: 制霸西班牙

original: Navarra has been a runt among the great nations of Iberia for too long. It is time for the Kingdom of Pamplona to dominate the entire Peninsula and establish a Basque empire!
translation: 纳瓦拉长期以来一直是伊比利亚半岛大国中的小邦。现在是潘普洛纳王国统治整个半岛并建立巴斯克帝国的时候了。

original: The Plight of our Kin
translation: 同胞的困境

original: For many hundreds of years, the infidel reconquista has persecuted our brethren in Iberia. Where once the benevolent caliphate brought peace to the region, now our people flock to us in droves. It becomes us to prepare a home for them, that they might find the welcoming embrace of the faithful.
translation: 数百年来，异教徒的再征服运动迫害了我们在伊比利亚的兄弟们。仁慈的哈里发曾经为那片地区带来和平，而现在那里的人民只能蜂涌而来寻求庇护。为他们的加入准备一个家吧！他们定能受到信徒们热情的拥抱。

original: Qalat Al-Hamra
translation: 阿尔罕布拉宫

original: Since the days of Emir Mohammed ben Al-Ahmar, this towering palace has been the pinnacle of artisanal construction. His successors added numerous wonders to the grand complex; the Lion Court, the Court of the Myrtles, and the exquisite Hall of the Ambassadors. Should we continue in this tradition, we will enshrine ourselves as a center of art and culture for years to come.
translation: 自从埃米尔·穆罕默德·本·阿尔·艾哈迈尔的时代以来，这座高耸入云的宫殿就成了手工建筑的巅峰。他的继任者为宏伟的建筑群：狮子宫，香桃木院，和精美的使节厅增添了许多奇迹。如果我们继续保持这种传统，我们将在今后的岁月里把自己尊奉为艺术和文化的中心。

original: Moroccan Ties
translation: 摩洛哥的联系

original: The Sultans in Morocco have long held us in high regard. If we are ever to emerge from our precarious position in Iberia, we should consider cementing our friendship in a more formal arrangement. It should be said, however, that the glory we would gain from showing the world that we have no need of the patronizing support of our would-be benefactors, could taste even greater indeed.
translation: 摩洛哥的苏丹一直以来都高度重视我们。如果我们想永远摆脱伊比利亚的困境，应该考虑以更正式的方式巩固与摩洛哥的友谊。又或者说，我们向世界宣布我们不需要摩洛哥的施舍所带来的荣誉，这种尝试也许会使我们更加强大。

original: If you choose to complete this mission without the help of Morocco, you will also gain:
translation: 如果你选择在没有摩洛哥帮助的情况下完成此任务，您还将获得：

original: Prepare for War
translation: 准备战争

original: The armies of Castile have encroached ever further into land once rightfully conquered by our predecessors, the Almohads. Decades of instability in our nation must be put aside, and grievances abandoned, in order to begin the process of reclaiming our diminishing heritage.
translation: 卡斯蒂利亚的军队进一步侵占了我们先辈穆瓦希德征服的合法领土。必须将我们国家几十年的矛盾放在一边，放弃不满，为了收回我们日益减少的遗产。

original: Retake Balansiyah
translation: 夺回巴伦西亚

original: The ancient Andalusian citadel of Balansiyah fell to the Reconquista, nearly two centuries previously. The mistreatment of our brothers and sisters in faith, however, has not been forgotten. We must reclaim this great city, and the surrounding lands, and remind Europe that we are not as helpless as they once believed.
translation: 近两个世纪前，古安达卢西亚的巴伦西亚城堡在收复运动中沦陷。然而，我们的兄弟姐妹在信仰上受到的虐待并没有被忘记。我们必须收回这座伟大的城市和周边的领土，并提醒欧洲，我们并不像他们曾经认为的那样无助。

original: The Port of Sebtah
translation: 休达港

original: The meddling Christian kings ensured that the strategic port of Sebtah remains out of our grasp. Despite numerous attempts to liberate our mistreated kin, it once again lies under foreign rule. Make landfall, and establish our beachhead once again.
translation: 基督教国王的干涉使休达这个战略港口脱离了我们的掌控。尽管多次尝试解放我们受虐待的同胞，但它再一次受到外国统治。登陆吧！重新建立我们的桥头堡。

original: Liberate Qurtuba
translation: 解放科尔多瓦

original: The grand cities of Isbiliyah and Qurtuba were once renowned throughout the known world, as bastions of Islamic thought. If we are to retake our rightful place on the world stage, we must evict the foreign oppressors, and restore them to their former glory.
translation: 塞维利亚和科尔多瓦这些宏伟的城市曾经作为伊斯兰思想的大本营而闻名于世。如果我们要在世界舞台上夺回我们应有的地位，我们必须驱逐那些外国压迫者，并恢复它们昔日的荣耀。

original: Restore al-Andalus
translation: 重建安达卢西亚

original: For nearly eight centuries, southern Iberia was known to the Islamic world as al-Andalus, and was a shining beacon of prosperity throughout the Mediterranean. It may seem a lofty goal, but the restoration of this blessed state would ensure that our names go down in history for all time. Bring those in our lands to the true faith, and proclaim our majesty once more!
translation: 近八个世纪以来，伊比利亚南部被伊斯兰世界称为“安达卢西亚”，它是整个地中海繁荣的灯塔。这似乎是一个极高的目标，但恢复这片神圣的地区将使我们的名字永远的载入史册。让我们那片土地上的人有真正的信仰，再一次宣示我们的威严！

original: Portuguese Naval Rivalry
translation: 葡萄牙海军较量

original: The key to success at the mouth of the Mediterranean has always been in maintaining a strong naval presence. The Portuguese learned this with trial and error. If we are to profit from our advantageous position, we must rival this threat immediately.
translation: 保持强大的海军力量一直是获得地中海河口成功的关键。葡萄牙人经过反复的尝试才学会了这一点。如果我们要从我们的有利地位中获利，我们就必须立即对抗这一威胁。

original: Seize Trade Dominance
translation: 抢占贸易主导地位

original: The wily merchants of Portugal have established a clear advantage in the waters around Iberia. Not all battles must be fought with sword and shield - make sure that their traders return with paltry offerings, and attain the mercantile dominance we deserve.
translation: 诡计多端的葡萄牙商人在伊比利亚附近的水域建立了明显的优势。并非所有的战争都必须用剑和盾来打——确保他们的商人带着微薄的回报返回，以实现应该属于我们的商业主导地位。

original: Rout the Pretenders!
translation: 击溃篡位者

original: The throne of the Emirate of Granada has been under constant attack from those who would see themselves Emir. We must present a united front to the encroaching Christian threat, by dealing once and for all, with the bitter feuds within our state.
translation: 格拉纳达埃米尔国的王位不断受到那些自认为是埃米尔的人的攻击。我们必须通过一劳永逸地处理我们国家内部的激烈争斗，建立一个统一战线来对付基督教的威胁。

original: Restore Faith in the Throne
translation: 恢复王权的威信

original: The bloody struggle for the throne of Granada is finally over. We must institute a campaign of resolution and improvement across our land, to show all our people that the only true threats to our realm come from our foreign foes.
translation: 争夺格拉纳达王位的血腥斗争终于结束了。我们必须在全国发起一场决心和改进运动，向我们所有的人民表明，我国面临的真正威胁来自我们的外敌。

original: Granadan Succession War is over.
translation: 格拉纳达王位继承战争结束了。

original: Restore Qurtuba
translation: 重建科尔多瓦

original: The city of Qurtuba underwent huge decline due both to the decadence of its elite, and the oppression of foreign tyrants. Return it to a state befitting our restored nation.
translation: 科尔多瓦这座城市由于其精英阶层的堕落和外国暴君的压迫而经历了巨大的衰落。重建使它恢复以融入我们的国家。

original: The §Y'Qurtuba Restored'§! province triggered modifier will be added to Qurtuba
translation: §Y「收复科尔多瓦」§!省份修正将被添加到科尔多瓦

original: End Kingdom of Portugal
translation: 葡萄牙王国终结

original: The Kingdom of Portugal has controlled the rich western coast of Iberia for too long. Much of this territory once rightfully lay in the hands of our ancestors, and must be reclaimed. Word has it that they are seeking new conquests in far-flung lands - perhaps we could use this opportunity as pretext to investigate further.
translation: 葡萄牙王国已经控制伊比利亚富饶的西海岸太久了。这片曾经属于我们祖先的土地，现在必须收回。有消息说他们正在遥远的土地上寻求新的征服——也许我们可以利用这个机会作为进一步追究的借口。

original: Continue Exploration
translation: 继续探索

original: The surprise discovery of the new world has gripped our people in a frenzy of exploration. Continue this voyage of discovery, that we may lay claim to this new land before our erstwhile oppressors can.
translation: 新世界的意外发现使我们的人民陷入了探索的狂热之中。继续这一探索之旅，以便在我们昔日的压迫者面前，对这片新土地提出要求。

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! or their subjects own at least §Y5§! fully colonized provinces in the Colonial Caribbean colonial region.
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!或它的附庸至少拥有§Y5§!个加勒比殖民省份。

original: Coast of Brazil
translation: 巴西海岸

original: The coast of this new world holds wonders beyond all imagination. Bring enlightenment to the peoples thereof, and seek out what riches lie within. To fully exploit this region, we must establish a sizable colony.
translation: 这个新世界的海岸拥有超乎想象的奇迹。将启蒙运动带给它的人民，并寻找其内在的财富。为了充分开发这个地区，我们必须建立一个相当大的殖民地。

original: The Caribbean
translation: 加勒比

original: The sheer riches of this new land dotted with islands and archipelagos, is beyond our wildest dreams. Establish an administrative authority to act as a base of operations in our new colonial ventures.
translation: 这片布满岛屿和群岛的新大陆中所蕴藏的巨大财富是我们做梦也想不到的。建立一个行政当局，作为我们新的殖民事业的行动基地。

original: Islands of the Mediterranean
translation: 地中海岛屿

original: The various islands situated around the mediterranean could, with the right overlord, be ideally situated to take advantage of the sheer wealth that flows into Europe. Claim them, and make sure that they play an integral part in our revenge upon the Christian kings of the continent.
translation: 位于地中海沿岸的各个岛屿，在合适的君主的带领下，完全可以利用其处在欧洲的巨额财富流通的理想位置。要求他们，确保他们在我们对欧洲大陆的基督教国王的复仇中发挥不可或缺的作用。

original: Retake Sicily
translation: 夺回西西里

original: The Emirate of Sicily was wrested from the hands of the decadent and destructive Byzantine Empire in the 9th Century. It flourished under Muslim rule, remaining a cultural melting pot of diverse peoples, until it fell to Roger of Sicily in the late 11th Century. Many long for this wondrous island to be returned to our fast-growing empire - make it so.
translation: 西西里埃米尔国于公元9世纪从腐朽和破败的拜占庭帝国手中被夺去。它在穆斯林统治下蓬勃发展，一直是多元民族的文化大熔炉，直到11世纪末落入西西里的鲁杰罗手中。许多人渴望这座神奇的岛屿回归到我们快速发展的帝国中来——让它回归吧。

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! or their subjects own at least §Y10§! fully colonized provinces in the Colonial Brazil colonial region.
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!或它的附庸至少拥有§Y10§!个巴西殖民省份。

original: Almohad Lands
translation: 阿尔摩哈德之地

original: The Almohad dynasty forged an Empire as great as that of the legendary Alexander, whom the Greeks praise with adoring sycophancy. The northern coast of Africa is ours by right. Liberate it from the petty successors who know not the heritage they are heir to.
translation: 阿尔摩哈德王朝建立了一个和传说中的亚历山大帝国一样伟大的帝国，希腊人用崇拜的谄媚来赞美他。非洲北部海岸理所当然是我们的。把它从那些不知道自己继承了什么遗产的小人物手中解放出来。

original: Into Egypt
translation: 进入埃及

original: Tussled over for generations, the fertile delta of Egypt holds some of the richest land in the world. Before the slaving despots, the Mamluks, Saladin, and less notable conquerors, Egypt was ruled in harmony by the Fatimid Caliphate, who claimed descent from the Prophet Muhammad - peace be upon him. Take this land, and place it under our benevolent overlordship.
translation: 经过几代人的争夺，富饶的埃及三角洲拥有世界上最富饶的土地。在奴隶暴君、马穆鲁克人、萨拉丁人以及不那么引人注目的征服者之前，埃及是由法蒂玛王朝和谐统治的，法蒂玛王朝声称自己是先知穆罕默德的后裔——愿和平降临在他身上。占领这片土地，把它置于我们仁慈的君主的统治之下。

original: Moroccan Conquest
translation: 摩洛哥的征服

original: It is with sadness that sometimes old friends must part ways. Despite our long history of support from Morocco, our people clamor for the union of their land with ours. The Moroccan Sultan must bend the knee.
translation: 老朋友有时不得不分开，这是令人伤心的。尽管我们长期得到摩洛哥的支持，我们的人民仍然要求他们的土地与我们的土地结合。摩洛哥苏丹必须屈膝。

original: Caliphate of Cordoba
translation: 科尔多瓦哈里发国

original: The territory of the Cordoban Caliphate almost entirely encompassed Iberia. Rout the three Spains, and take back what is rightfully ours!
translation: 科尔多瓦哈里发国的领土几乎将整个伊比利亚包围，击溃三个西班牙国家，拿回本属我们的土地！

original: Iberian Dawn
translation: 伊比利亚黎明

original: History always held a special place for the land of the Kingdom of Leon. The last lands out of reach of the Caliphate of Cordoba. Rectify this mistake, and bring all of Iberia under our control. All of Europe must tremble at our might!
translation: 历史总是使里昂王国的土地处于特殊的地位。科尔多瓦哈里发最后一片尚未掌控的土地。纠正这个失误，把整个伊比利亚都置于我们的控制之下。整个欧洲都要为我们的力量而战栗！

original: Crusader Kings
translation: 十字军诸王

original: The French Kings have been responsible for numerous atrocities committed upon our brethren in the west. Now that the tables are turned, claim their own land - which they once thought safe - and push further into Europe.
translation: 法国诸王在我们西方的弟兄身上犯下了种种暴行，现在三十年河东三十年河西，宣称他们的土地，他们觉得安全无忧的土地，把领土深入欧洲。

original: Levantine Restoration
translation: 恢复黎凡特

original: Damascus was the site of the capital of the very origin of the Umayyad dynasty. Syria itself is an ancient and holy land - it must be treated with care and respect, however, it must also be ours.
translation: 大马士革是倭马亚王朝的首都所在地。叙利亚是一块古老而神圣的土地，必须谨慎和尊重地对待它，但即使如此，它也必须是我们的。

original: Holiest of Cities
translation: 至圣之城

original: Mecca, the most holy city upon this earth, lies within our grasp. Taking control of this vital place will give us the respect and admiration of our brethren the world over, of this we are sure.
translation: 麦加，尘世中最为神圣的城市，在我们掌握之中。我们确定，控制这处要地将使我们得到全世界教友们的尊崇。

original: Follow the Tigris
translation: 沿着底格里斯河

original: The fertile plains of Mesopotamia are the birthplace of civilizations. This land is integral to the functioning of all surrounding continents, and whomsoever controls it, controls the flow of wealth in all directions.
translation: 美索不达米亚肥沃的平原是许多文明的发源地。这片土地是周围所有大陆运转的枢纽。无论是谁，只要控制了这块土地，就控制了四周的财富流动。

original: African Opportunities
translation: 非洲的机遇

original: The Gold Coast, as it is known, holds many opportunities for diversion of valuable trade, and for exploitation of resources. Now that we are on our feet once again, we must look to these foreign climes for resources to fuel our expansion.
translation: 众所周知，黄金海岸保留了许多有价值的贸易转移和资源开发的机会。既然我们又重新站起来了，我们必须依赖国外肥沃地区的资源，以此刺激扩张。

original: Monopolize Guinea
translation: 垄断几内亚

original: The wealth that appears to exist in these newfound lands is truly astounding. We must ensure that it is kept flowing to our ports, else we find ourselves starved of income.
translation: 这处新发现的土地上所有的财富令人惊异，我们必须确保这些财富流入我们的港口，否则我们的收入将捉襟见肘。

original: The Heartland
translation: 曾经的帝国中心

original: Persia has seen millenia of war, conquest, and empire. This land belonged to our ancestors, and by extension, belongs to us. Many holy cities lie in this land - claim them in our name.
translation: 波斯见证过无数战争、征服和帝国。这片土地属于我们的祖先，自然属于我们。许多圣城坐落于此，以我们之名宣称她。

original: Pirate Trade Practices
translation: 海盗贸易制度

original: You can get more with a kind word and a cutlass than with just a kind word.
translation: 同时用胡萝卜加大棒得到的效果更好，而不仅仅是用胡萝卜。

original: Free Trading Ports
translation: 自由贸易港

original: By controlling key trade ports ourselves we can circumvent the criminally high trade fees set by local traders.
translation: 通过控制主要贸易港口，我们可以避开当地贸易商设定的过分高额的交易费。

original: Trading In Gold
translation: 用黄金贸易

original: Trading with gold is easy, it's value is indisputable. The only thing worth it's weight in gold is gold.
translation: 用黄金交易是最简单的，因为它的价值无可争议。黄金的价值就只决于它本身。

original: Exploiting The Triangle Trade
translation: 开发三角贸易

original: By raiding the transatlantic slave traders we shall bolster our own numbers and show all slaving tyrants that a pirate's life is free!
translation: 通过袭击横渡大西洋的奴隶贩子，我们将鼓舞我们的弟兄们，并向所有的奴隶暴君证明一个海盗的生命是自由的！

original: A Second Madagascar
translation: 第二马达加斯加

original: Following the words of Thomas Barrow we shall develop our free haven and create a pirate republic worthy of being called 'a second Madagascar'.
translation: 按照托马斯·巴罗的话，我们将发展我们的自由天堂，创造一个值得被称为“第二个马达加斯加”的海盗共和国。

original: An Old Fort
translation: 一个古老的要塞

original: Before conquering all of the Caribbean we must secure our position and build a fort that shall stand long after we all rest in Davy Jones' locker.
translation: 在征服整个加勒比海之前，我们必须巩固我们的阵地。建造一座坚不可摧的堡垒，在我们所有人都在戴维·琼斯的箱子里安息之后，它将永久屹立。

original: Running Down To Cuba
translation: 奔向古巴

original: Cuba belongs to us pirates, why else would there be a song about it?
translation: 古巴属于我们海盗，不然怎么会有一首关于它的歌呢？

original: Pirates Of The Caribbean
translation: 加勒比海盗

original: He who controls the gold controls the globe.
translation: 控制黄金就可以控制全世界。

original: The Golden Age Of Piracy
translation: 海盗的黄金时代

original: There are no problems in this world that cannot be solved with gold. And if all else fails it can be used to buy more rum!
translation: 这个世界上没有黄金不能解决的问题。就算有，它还可以用来购买更多的朗姆酒！

original: A Pirate Fleet
translation: 一支海盗舰队

original: With a big enough fleet, no prize will be out of our grasp!
translation: 有了足够大的船队，就没有我们拿不到的财宝！

original: A Scourge On The Seven Seas
translation: 七海之鞭

original: Any respectable confederacy of pirates must have a flagship, and a captain worthy of commanding it.
translation: 任何令人尊敬的海盗联盟都必须有一个旗舰，和一个有能力指挥它的船长。

original: No Purchase, No Pay
translation: 没有猎物，就没有晚饭

original: We will rally the bravest fighters to our cause by ensuring that those who fight for us are fairly rewarded, as according to the Pirate Code.
translation: 根据海盗法典，我们将团结最勇敢的战士，确保那些为我们的事业而战的人得到公平的奖励。

original: Pirate Diplomacy
translation: 海盗外交

original: Remember; it has to rhyme!
translation: 记住；它必须押韵！

original: The Pirate Threat
translation: 海盗威胁

original: When our name is known on all the seven seas, free pirates will flock to our cause and we will give those who do not yet fear us cause to.
translation: 当我们声名远扬时，自由的海盗们会蜂拥而至，而我们会给那些还不惧怕我们的人一些麻烦。

original: A Pirate Hoard
translation: 一个海盗宝藏

original: That is the second biggest pirate hoard I've ever seen!
translation: 那是我所见过的第二大的海盗宝藏！

original: A Pirate Federation
translation: 一个海盗联邦

original: It's quite a loose federation and the rules are more like 'guidelines', but it will surely benefit us both.
translation: 这是一个相当松散的联盟，它的法规更像是“指导方针”，但它肯定会使我们双方都受益。

original: Renowned Buccaneer
translation: 声名显赫的海盗

original: A true pirate leader will inspire our buccaneers to great deeds, and make sure that tribute is paid promptly.
translation: 一个真正的海盗领袖将会激励我们的海盗成就伟大的事迹，并确保他们及时缴纳贡品。

original: The Pirate Round
translation: 海盗航路

original: Raiding the rich Indian coast will bring us much booty. Some will have to be shared with the pirates of Madagascar however, if we wish to use their ports to resupply. Unless, unless...
translation: 袭击富有的印度海岸会给我们带来很多战利品。不过，如果我们想利用马达加斯加的港口进行再补给，就得提供其中的一些与那里的海盗分享。除非……

original: By completing this mission we will gain permanent claims on all gold provinces in and around the Caribbean
translation: 完成这项任务我们将会获得加勒比地区及其周边所有黄金省份的永久宣称

original: §Y[Root.GetName]§! has a famous pirate leader as ruler
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!有一位著名的海盗领袖作为统治者

original: Control East Khorasan
The heartlands of our late liege Timur the Lame are central to our heritage. When we possess them all, our claim will have much more merit.
Control West Khorasan
Stretching towards the exotic lands of India, West Khorasan is vital to the continued success of our kingdom.
Prepare for War
The great Timur's hordes were a fearsome sight to behold. We cannot hope to reunite his legacy with a pitiful handful of soldiers.
Gain §G10.00§! Mandate.
Own §YTenerife§! as a core province or own any province on the §YNorth America§!, §YSouth America§!, or §YNew World§! continents.
Own a province in the New World
§Y5§! states owned by §Y[Root.GetName]§! or its subjects in §YColonial Colombia§! have an assigned Holy Order.
§Y5§! states owned by §Y[Root.GetName]§! or its subjects in the §YMexico§! region have an assigned Holy Order.
§Y[Root.GetName]§! has discovered all provinces in the §YMoluccas§! region.
§Y15§! states owned by §Y[Root.GetName]§! or its subjects in §YNorth America§! and §YSouth America§! have an assigned Holy Order.
If [Root.GetName] has good relations with the owner of §YHizen§!, the §YPortuguese Nagasaki§! event happens\nElse Gain §G3.00§! Mercantilism
